author: {'steamid': '76561198134796270', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 755, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 680, 'last_played': 1709213000}
review:
I regret I didn't write the review earlier, as a fan of this sub-genre. It's very sad how things have turned out, as Waves series valiantly kept abstract twin-stick shooters alive, giving the positive vision after Geometry Wars passed the torch. Hopefully, somebody will make another great GW-clone one day, popularizing this sub-genre again even amidst roguelite twin-sticks like Vampire Survivors (which is great by itself, no less)

Rest in peace, Rob Hale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021643308', 'num_games_owned': 1340, 'num_reviews': 300, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1690295801}
review:
Interesting game, you're a 'rolling ball with lasers' in a field. Other balls try to ram into you in various different ways. You shoot them to survive. There's a number of different gameplay styles and the dialog was written by a smartass. 

It's a simple enough premise but difficult to master. I'm... not very good at it, lol. But I like it. :)

In any case, it's free to play and certainly worth a try.

review:
上一次看见因癌症死去的人还是吃喝不愁 这次是波动作者 怎么说呢 这两位都是具有无私奉献的精神的人 他们的精神至死不渝 就像鲁迅说的那样 "使一个人的有限的生命，更加有效，也即等于延长了人的生命。"

author: {'steamid': '76561198069085041', 'num_games_owned': 1890, 'num_reviews': 452, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1689705998}
review:
Waves is a consistent twin stick arena shooter, kind of Beat Hazard peppered with Valve's Portal aesthetic. Simple design, nice visuals and it's free. One downside, it basically features only one level and it's just this circular arena you see on the screenshots. It manages to bring variety though by offering six different game modes.

Now about the reason it's free now. It basically was a one man studio and he passed away due to cancer back in 2022. So that's a kind of his final gift.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980318139', 'num_games_owned': 1165, 'num_reviews': 297, 'playtime_forever': 618, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 618, 'last_played': 1674679821}
review:
Dobra odreagovacka, nekolik modu, na achievy celkem vyzva, nutne dobre posbirat modifikatory na combo.
Vsechny mody jsou v male kruhove arene.
Lze se pohybovat, strilet, zpomalit cas a pokladat bomby.

Crunch time - 3 minuty a neomezene zivotu
Survival - 3 zivoty
Rush - 2 minuty, level +10sec / smrt -10sec
Bombing run - 3 zivoty, neze strilet, sbirate cas / bomby
Challenge - 20 pripravenych scenaru na cilovy cas / combo
Chase - 4 vteriny na presun k timeru
Hold - omezeny prostor, kde lze strilet

author: {'steamid': '76561198155654639', 'num_games_owned': 581, 'num_reviews': 150, 'playtime_forever': 704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 561, 'last_played': 1674797783}
review:
+ Free
+ Good Graphics
+ Good Music
+ Fluid Movement
+ Slowmo and almost unlimited bombs (once you know how to get them)

The best way to describe Waves is, six or seven more modes for Geometry Wars 3.  I could really see this as a DLC for GWs3.  If you enjoy GWs3, there's no reason not to grab this now that it is free.  Waves 2 is also free now.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116879965', 'num_games_owned': 1283, 'num_reviews': 6891, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1673944608}
review:
Поклонники шутеров заслуживают большего. А те, кто еще не открыл для себя twin stick-шутеры, обязательно должны испытать это удовольствие. Представляем Waves - игру, которая привлекает внимание не только новичков, но и самых закаленных фанатов.
Waves проста и понятна, но требует недюжинного умения. В ней убрано все лишнее, но остался главный смысл: достижение рекордов.
Целью игры является уничтожение врагов при помощи комбо-ударов и часовых бомб, а когда становится особенно жарко, вы можете использовать замедление времени и превратить поражение в победу. Игроки могут соревноваться в пяти различных режимах игры и смотреть свои очки и достижения в таблице рекордов на пути к первенству.

даже в 2023 году интересно играть.Очень интересная игра.Само собой подобных игр уже кучу сделали но вэйвс до сих пор не уступает подобным современным играм

author: {'steamid': '76561199238033827', 'num_games_owned': 40, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 11380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11301, 'last_played': 1708441056}
review:
玩游戏也很多年了,前几周我干了我最后悔的一件事
我是成就控,WAVES当时打了150小时,也算是玩的比大多数人要更久,但是因为语言,技术的原因我刷成就十分困难,我便萌生了steam++直接解锁成就的想法
当我解锁了剩下的20多个成就后,我感到十分的兴奋h因为这是我第一次解锁,但是不到十分钟我就后悔了
当初了解到游戏的时候是22年的8月,作者不幸离世,将两款游戏都转为了永久免费作为最后的礼物
我在刷到视频后立刻入了WAVES1和2,打了一下午,对作者无限感叹
因为算是比较爽的横板射击了,所以就不知不觉玩了很久,但是我又想要他全成就,所以50多个成就中剩下的20多个是真我不行
开完成就后当时又想起了作者,我真他妈不是人啊,我居然通过作弊来游玩作者留在人世的最后一份礼物,太对不起他了
现在偶尔玩玩WAVES2,2的成就很难刷,玩起来也很吃力,但是我不管是通过查英文攻略还是查中文攻略都或多或少的了解了一部分知识,我不想再做任何伤害作者的事了,我要好好游玩他的作品
现在听着WAVES2的第一首音乐:Level One  动听的电音加钢琴仿佛把人拉到WAVES世界当中 看着steam商店中那劲爆的商店宣传画面,我不禁又鼻尖一酸,，或许作者已经走过了他的level last ,但是我们将永远铭记他

#f4ckcancer



damn i only just heard... heres the post from Squid In a Box FB...

Hello, I am CJ, I am Squid’s (Rob’s) partner. I have an announcement, and quite honestly it’s one of the hardest announcements I think I will ever have to make. Rob passed away a fortnight ago as a result of complications from cancer after a prolonged and arduous stay in hospital. I would have liked to have made the announcement sooner, but I simply wasn’t composed enough to sit down and write something meaningful until now. 
This unfortunate event however, means that this facebook page will soon close, as Rob’s main facebook page will be memorialised around a week to two weeks from now. I know that this news is shocking and I wanted to give you all a warning so that you can leave any messages you feel you need to, and friend anyone in the community that you’d like to keep touch with.
By now you will have noticed that both Waves and Waves 2 are free to play across all platforms. This was something Rob was considering anyway within the past two months as their health entered into more substantial difficulties, so I hope this can be seen as a parting gift to all those out there that haven’t yet played either of these games. 
Rob was very passionate about their work, and ever so dedicated, over the years we were together they were always dreaming big and trying so hard to create the best game they could possibly make. This did mean that sometimes Rob would shoot for the moon and miss, and it does mean that unfortunately, Waves 2 will definitely remain incomplete. But that doesn’t take away from my awe and the pride I always had in Rob to see someone so dedicated to their craft. It was a joy to support Rob, through that initial kickstarter, and the years of indie development that followed. I know they would have liked to have completed that final project, but as covid encroached, the need to have a more stable income was looming and between these factors and Rob’s struggles with their health, they never got the time to cap off this particular branch of their legacy. 
But what Rob did achieve was inspirational and amazing to me; to have done all that solo development work, to be continually challenging themselves and polishing their games as they went…it was a joy to witness, and something that I always supported wholeheartedly. 
So I hope all of you out there, whoever you are and however Rob’s games have reached you, that you can at the very least hold a special place for the Waves games, and that they continue to bring you many more hours of chill, challenge, and possibly even frustration, but most of all I hope that you can continue to feel the passion and love that Rob poured into these games long after the pain of their passing begins to fade. 
Thank you all so, so much, 
CJ xXx

review:
作者的大爱我无需过多赘述
不要再催中文补丁了，个人认为英文玩起来更有感觉，更有意境。
磁性的女声给人一种赛博感
还有一些声音提示bomb ready但是按下空格没反应的我的理解是必须倍率要骤然拉高才能释放，不是bug

author: {'steamid': '76561198409161538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 872, 'last_played': 1708787330}
review: 有一个bug，当分数达到一定程度时炸弹放不出来。不过没想到弹幕射击游戏能做得这么爽，音乐很动感，这游戏需要大量使用“炸弹combo”,"时缓击杀","近距离击杀"来刷分，直接刷爆一个int类型的最大值I Am Fpdrummond，成就里面就剩那些个挑战模式5颗星的无法完成，实在不理解怎样减少开火次数才能达到5颗星？还有如果能有mod把球球改成机动战士，把炸弹改成挥舞光剑就更牛逼了。

author: {'steamid': '76561199208055509', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1667821255}

author: {'steamid': '76561197977468171', 'num_games_owned': 1300, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1751, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1732, 'last_played': 1669944098}
review:
There's just something about this game that keeps me coming back to it even for a casual game or two every few months ever since I bought this 10 years ago. 

What I originally thought was going to be a simple Geometry Wars clone ended up being something far more fun with better mechanics than that series offered across those games to me. If you like twin stick arcade style shooters, this is a must play.

Edit: Saw that the developer, Rob, passed away. So I encourage playing this game even more to see how wonderful an experience this is. Rest in peace.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967154486', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1700197753}
review:
[h1] Magnificant! [/h1]
Visually striking with a soundtrack to match.
This game is [b] exciting [/b]
A truly epic bequest from the developer.

Multiple modes of play to test, train and tackle.  Witty comments in the "how to play" and post games.

What I most appreciate about this game is the casual nature in which it can be played.  You can easily have a single game or, alternatively, find yourself deeply immersed in the addictive drive to do better.

Gameplay succeeds through scoring complexity, risk management, reflexes and luck.

It is fun to play, fun to watch.  Simply a masterpiece!

author: {'steamid': '76561199106461081', 'num_games_owned': 40, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1699798507}
review:
One of my favorite games. I remember playing this game as maybe a 12 year old at my uncles place in a student apartment. This game just makes you happy, and the memories that I personaly have with this game is just putting a smile on my face. Just gives me a warm feeling.

I wondered why the game is now free when I discovered that the developer died. Dont be sad that it ended, be happy that it happened.

This and the background and the personal connections to this game is just a piece of heart ^^

author: {'steamid': '76561198329066299', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1662036896}
review:
Riscattato e provato (purtoppo) dopo la morte dello sviluppatore Squid in a box (Rob Hale) che andando via ha deciso di regalare i suoi due giochi Waves e l'ancora in lavorazione Waves 2...è un vero peccato perchè già da solo 10 minuti di gameplay si capisce che Hale ci metteva passione in quello che faceva e ha tirato fuori un 2d top down shooter di ottima fattura.
Si capisce la serietà di uno sviluppatore quando decide di fare un regalo così bello e grande alla community, e chissà quali altri progetti avrebbe potuto portare se fosse rimasto in vita.

author: {'steamid': '76561198849225741', 'num_games_owned': 17, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1661761031}

review:
Intense Twin Stick Shooter.
In a circle arena, try your best to survive and aim for highest score. With ability to slow down the time, and drop bomb while in combo.
A brilliant arcade game. Thanks for your gift.

author: {'steamid': '76561198238368016', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1711069311}
review: Waves feels like a spiritual successor to Geometry Wars. It has the same fast-paced twin stick movement, the same exciting soundtrack, and tons of particles and effects on everything. It also brings some new and clever twists that make it different from other twin stick shooters. As sad as it is that the developer has sadly passed away from cancer (and fuck cancer btw), his choice to make his games free means that you have nothing to loose from trying it out yourself. You should definitely give Waves a try if you're looking for a new game to try.

author: {'steamid': '76561199049307038', 'num_games_owned': 88, 'num_reviews': 326, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1661656725}
review:
玩家控制的小球死亡后，周围的小球也会全部死亡

模式： 1 关键时刻（Crunch  time）， 无线条命，限时，看击杀分数

           2 生存模式（Survival），不限时，四条命
        
           3 冲（rush），限时，短时赛，无限条命
           
           4 爆炸时刻（Bombing time），没有武器，只能靠翻滚去触碰绿环（消灭周围全部敌人）和红环（开始倒计时，计时结束后，损失一条命）

           5 挑战赛（Challenge），不限时，4条命，线性关卡（20关），死亡后一次后该关卡直接结束进入下一关。命用完后结束，再次游玩则重新开始

           6 追赶（Chase），不限时，4条命，通过追赶红环来续时间，时间结束后损失一条命

           7 保持（Hold），4条命，要待在一个会移动的圈内，不在圈内不能开枪



游戏评测：一大早从抖音看到说这个游戏的视频，作者因癌症去世，现将游戏设为免费，于是赶忙下载来玩，游戏本身还可以，适合偶尔玩一下用来消遣，但对于我来说这种游戏很容易玩腻（无聊），画面也是那种亮亮的霓虹感（不感冒），音乐单调，模式平庸，但毕竟是一个独立游戏，也没必要挑刺，如果这游戏能让你感到快乐（舒服）就行了，因人而异吧
   

                         将该游戏添加到我的游戏库就当作我对于游戏开发者最崇高的敬意吧，谢谢你让我玩到该游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198061408051', 'num_games_owned': 58, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1661792123}
review:
Cool game! Played Geometry Wars way back and this was so refreshing, actually a legit stick shooter game which reduces some of the more painful aspects you get typically in these games and has a lot of cool modes I've never seen before (like the one where you play a bomb, actually a lot of fun). Graphics are really nice and trippy - love it.

Thank you Rob! RIP

review:
Highly recommended if you like arcadey games like Geometry Wars, and for the price of free, you can't go wrong.
I bought Waves on a whim a good 7 years ago, played it here and there, but only just got around to properly playing (and finishing) it last year.
Thank you, Rob. Based on your humour in the menus I have a feeling you were fun to be around.

review: Es una lástima haber descubierto este juego ante estas circunstancias. Este juego es muy divertido, mucho más de lo que pensaba. Es fácil de aprender, y a pesar de ser un bullet hell se hace agradable jugarlo gracias a los gráficos y la música. Tiene además varios modos de juego distintos que probar. Es un buen juego para desconectar un rato.

review:
非常经典的射击游戏，游戏中需要躲避随机生成的球块，富有挑战性的玩法加上动感的背景音乐，游玩的过程中特别解压。
游戏背景音乐响起警报时说明会有环形的球块生成在你附近，手柄的RT键可以时停，希望可以给予你一些小帮助。
it very interesting.
thank you.Rob

review: O grze dowiedziałem się z artykułu w necie,bo jej twórca niedawno zmarł i chciał,żeby gra była dostępna za darmo. No to postanowiłem ją wypróbować i muszę przyznać kawał dobrej gry, nie ma jakiejś wielkiej grafiki, za to jest wciągający gameplay, który niby jest prosty, ale żeby opanować to go dobrze kiedy na arenie roi się od przeciwników, wymaga dobrego skilla i pracy. Podsumowując Easy to play, Hard to Master. Twórco spoczywaj w pokoju i niech ci Ziemia lekką będzie.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993332976', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1695760194}
review:
The twin stick shooting action is very satisfying. I am just old enough to remember fixed shooters like Galaga. In Waves, the ability to roll around in a circular motion with both greater freedom, and also with more complications, is a very welcome variation on the whole make bright, candy colored thingies go BOOM premise. Each different game mode offers its own unique challenges and flavor. I really do like the fact that even though I prefer some game modes over others, by now my basic procedure is to have at least one go at each mode every time I boot the game. 
I want a better score each time and I'm watching those Steam achievements, sometimes I do that, sometimes I don't and this time a I certainly am. I confess to being to square and oblivious to the work of Robert Hale. I am only hear cause I read the articles about Their passing and their desire that Waves and its sequel should be made available for free. So, being the cheap bastard that I am, I greedily added both to my library, ALTHOUGH, I paid the $%^&ing 99 cents for the soundtrack, which is pretty generic, but it's fun. 
Not sure where all the snark comes from and that particular attitude just seems out of place is so bright and shiny and blitzy a game, but whatever, I am not a thin skinned person and I suppose it does motivate me to waste the time to do yet one more round. I say waste, but that's only because all gaming is a waste of time. Waves, is an example of game design at it's best, I am pretty well satisfied to say that Waves is a product made by a master of this craft of game design. I'll suggest you try it and leave it at that.

author: {'steamid': '76561199078832223', 'num_games_owned': 523, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1661268712}

review: This game is one of the best feeling arcade-like games I have played...Rob, you have done an amazing job and have gifted it to us all at no cost. Thank you for your work - rest in peace, and much love for your family. We will all be sure to look over and safeguard your legacy here.

review:
I read an article a few days ago regarding a game developer that had recently died of cancer and as a parting gift to everybody, he wanted to leave his games free for all to play.

I added both to my library and started playing Waves. I have found it incredibly addictive, wish I had seen it years ago.

RIP Rob Hale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046788559', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1689077329}

虽然Steam总时长只有36分钟，但在此之前，至少十数个小时陪我度过了高中和大学时期一部分让我难熬的时光。
谢谢你，再见。

author: {'steamid': '76561198883053100', 'num_games_owned': 77, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 9840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2418, 'last_played': 1662079267}
review:
独立游戏开发者 Rob Hale，又被称为 Squid in a Box，于本月早些时候因癌症去世。Hale 的伴侣 CJ 在 Hale 即将发布的下一款游戏《波动2》的 Steam 论坛上发布的公告中透露了这一消息。根据 Hale 的遗愿，CJ 已经让这位开发者的两款游戏《波动》和《波动2》在 Steam 上完全免费供所有人下载。
“这是罗伯在过去两个月里一直在考虑的事情，因为他的健康状况越来越差，”CJ 说：“我希望这可以被看作是给那些还没有玩过这些游戏的人们的临别礼物。”
Hale 的第一个项目《波动》于 2011 年发布。这是一款双摇杆射击游戏，具有独特的 Trance 节奏和 Chiptune 配乐。《波动》是 Steam 独立游戏早期的杰出作品，十多年后仍然值得回顾一遍

author: {'steamid': '76561199340426641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1661219789}
review:
开发者去世前把游戏设为免费，把游戏当成礼物送给想玩的人，而游戏所承载的情义把它的精神价值推向顶峰。
大清早，破大防。
作者走好。

我本身工作也是開發遊戲的軟體工程師

願作者在另個世界永遠快樂

author: {'steamid': '76561198067416544', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1661162993}
review:
這是我免費領取遊戲裡，最傷心也最開心的遊戲。
傷心是得知作者已去世。
開心是作者遺留他的作品免費讓我結緣。
有緣能玩到如此好玩的作品。
我想寫這篇評價，感謝作者。
謝謝你做出如此好玩的遊戲，讓人生充滿歡樂。
也謝謝你的最後慷慨，讓所有玩家免費領取遊玩。
願你在天國天堂一切再也無憂無慮開心的創作。
R.I.P

遊戲是非常輕鬆、爽快、刺激、絢麗、動感的射擊遊戲，非常好玩。
尤其是特殊技能Slow Motion橫掃360度的十面埋伏包圍敵人，非常爽快紓壓。

author: {'steamid': '76561198385170138', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1676484237}
review: my father whom was my best friend as well just passed away about 8 months ago . a month before that i had a pilonidal cyst surgery and i was not able to grief for him properly . on the night of surgery i remember he was with me all the night until the morning and he held my hand all the time because i was in really bad pain ( they gave me very strong drugs that night ) and i remember telling him : " i'am very thankful that you are with me in these tough situation and you are the best father ever " he slept maybe 1 hour on one of the hospital beds when i insist him to  .  he was very kind with everyone specially the kids . he was a very good father and  friend and he taught me a lot of things . he was always here for me when i needed him even though he and my mother divorced 5 years ago and he remarried with another woman . its been 8 moths and my surgery wound has not healed yet and i gained 20 kg due to being home all the time . i suffer from depression and i barely can cry . i wish i could cry . i used to have lots of friends but all vanished when the hard times appear . the game developer of these game named bob and he just passed away from cancer recently so this game and its sequel became free and playing it for a while and hearing the soundtrack of it and feeling safe and warm remained me of my father ... god bless you bob and may your soul rest in peace for eternal .

author: {'steamid': '76561198169337257', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1650026924}
review:
43/54の実績を解除してからのレビュー

360度のシューティングゲーム。
迫ってくる敵を倒しながら連鎖を稼ぎ、高得点を目指す。
基本はシューティングだが、ひたすら爆弾を点火し続けるモードなど、変わった遊び方も用意されている。

良い点
・内容
　操作は移動か撃つか連鎖で手に入れた爆弾を使うかしかない。
　あと、短時間だが動作をゆっくりにできる。
　非常に単純で頭を空っぽにしてハイスコアを狙いに結構遊べる。
　地味にキーの設定もできるため、細かいところにも目が届いている。

・音楽
　紹介映像で流れているような感じの音楽が流れる。
　ゲームと調和してて良い。
　サウンドトラックはついてこない。

・映像
　中盤に入って爆弾をガンガン撃てるようになると敵がキラキラ散って綺麗。
　背景も良い感じにころころ変わってくれる。

悪い点
・内容
　ESCの停止が遅い。何故か2秒くらいかかる。
　自機が存在しているときだけしか停止ができない。
　この謎仕様の所為で、やり直しするのに時間がかかってしまう（死亡→自機が出てくるまで待機→ESCを押してリスタート）。
　いっそリスタートのショートカットキーがあってもよかったのではないか。

・音楽
　やり直しをしたときに音楽が流れないことがある。
　時間が経つと次の音楽が流れるようになるが、調子が狂ってしまう。

値段の割には結構遊べるゲーム。
定価では流石に躊躇するだろうが、頻繁に超割引されているため、その時に買えば損はしない。

author: {'steamid': '76561198051385700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1627655305}
review: Hard not to recommend given the low price (on sale you can get it for half a buck), as you’ll definitely get your money’s worth if you’re looking for some quick arcade action. That said, it should be noted that the skill ceiling here is quite low, contrary to what the description on the store page promises. If you play this for 2-3 hours you will already have mastered the optimal scoring strategy, which boils down to chain-spamming bombs non-stop while triggering your slow-mo power for double points. Hence the game quickly turns into a mind-numbing endurance test as soon as you have the basics down. Also, for certain game modes it is not particularly hard to reach the maximum possible score of ~2.1 billion (or 2^31-1, the signed 32-bit integer limit), rendering the leaderboards useless.

The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. Ding  A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. Ding  Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. author: {'steamid': '76561197966692029', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 1183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 954, 'last_played': 1623774114}
review:
Twin-stick shooter: check.  
Vector graphics: check.  
Casually intense: check.  
Tons of difficult achievements: check

This is one of the most intense games I've ever played, and yet it can be picked up for 5 minutes at a time which makes it equivalent to a gaming-triple-espresso.  Its brother Waves2 exists and is very good as well, but has been in early release for too long.

Unlike Waves2, this game has no campaign, and no way to progress; it's rogue-lite in that sense.  Your goal is to survive and score better than you did the last time.  Maybe you'll even merit a spot on the leader boards - which aren't horrible, considering the age of this game.  There are more than half-a-dozen game types, and all will eventually result in your inescapable death.

One of the "undersold" features of this game is that it's sarcastically funny, and rags on you almost every time you finish a game.  Score slightly lower than you did on a previous attempt?  It will let you know in no uncertain terms.  After an hour of attempts, you smash your record with an epic session - and it'll tell you "meh".  There's a lot of humor in the casual messages displayed here, and it's one of the things I like best about it: while the game play is intense and a bit sweaty, the game doesn't take itself (or you) very seriously.

This is absolutely worth whatever money you spend on it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024795541', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 781, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 758, 'last_played': 1593338588}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971972173', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1590699669}
review: Thought I'd better give this game a go as I've had it a few months and not touched it. Ok - decent shoot-em-up. Nice coloured mesmerising lights with strange jingle jangling sound effects that almost send me into some kind of trance. I'm usually reasonably ok at these types of games and like to complete on the leaderboards of the friends list but I can't get close to Sysgen and Limeygeorge's scores at all. My excuse is that I go into trance. Big colourful pixel explosions combined with jingly jangley sounds get my vote any day, even if I'm no good at it.

review:
Waves is a fairly generic line-art/neon survival shmup (don't be fooled by the screenshots, the hexagons are just static background art).   You're stuck in the middle shooting enemies that spawn randomly.

Very mediocre shovelware gameplay with a disproportionately high $7.50.  There's shmups you can play for free or for a fraction of the price of this, I can't recommend this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088963369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 576, 'last_played': 1561406214}
review:
Waves is a arcade-style twin-stick top-down shooter with multiple modes of play that I personally find relatively engaging. It keeps you playing a few games once in a while, giving you the sweet satisfaction of destroying large quantities of shiny glowing objects with differentiating play patterns. 

It's simple, it's fun, I recommend it. 
The leaderboard is f***ed though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967725658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1542463020}
review:
全方位敵わらわら系STG…Geometry Warsフォロワーって言った方が通るかな。
サバイバルモードしかやってないけどまあ短時間ｲﾔｯﾎｩ!!!! ってやるには楽しいと思う。
難点が二つあって、BGMがいまいちなのと、スコアがカウントストップしちゃうこと。
聴いてて眠くなるような曲ばっかりで、ノリノリの曲がDisco Just Won't Cut It This Timeの一つしかないんだよね。
こういうゲームってのは、ノリの良い曲！！吹き飛ぶ破片！！激しい爆発！！砕いて砕いてギリギリで敵をすり抜けて！！スコアを稼いで稼いで稼ぎまくって何もかもそぎ落としたスコアの高みへ！！その頂へ！！！！ってトリップするのが楽しいのに、それを補助するBGMがなんだかなーっていう。
スコアはまあ倍率が上昇してくようなデザインだし、そりゃ上限に達するよねっていう。しかたないね。
そんなわけでお勧めか否かって言ったら、個人的にはわざわざ500円払ってプレイするほどではないけどやってみたら面白かったかな…って感じ。プレイしない方が良いゲームではない、がわざわざやるほどでも…? ていう微妙なライン。

author: {'steamid': '76561198055380675', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 751, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 751, 'last_played': 1561552262}
review:
There are no unlockables in this fast-paced single-player arcade game: it's just you vs the scoreboard.

Armed with nothing but a machine-gun with infinite ammo (left-click), a slow-motion power (right-click), and a localised nuke (spacebar), send your marble (WASD) into the ripple tank to destroy hordes of enemies in a cascade of glittering particles. Killing enemies nets you points and experience; touching an enemy causes you to lose a life and respawn in an empty arena.

Experience accumulates to increase your level. On level-up a multiplier powerup will appear: grab it before it expires to increase your score multiplier by 1 for the rest of the round. Enemies spawn with greater variety and frequency at higher levels. Also, every 10 levels grants you an extra life!

Kill enemies quickly to earn a combo, which will increase the points you get. Getting a 10x combo gives you a bomb charge, which will expire shortly if it isn't used. Long combo chains can let you spam bombs repeatedly, gaining you tons of points. Kills made during slow-mo also award double points.

As described on the store page, there are several different play modes, each with their own variations on the game rules. Controls and interface are smooth and responsive, graphics are pretty but not too distracting, and the snarky/motivational little quips on the end-of-round scoreboard are a neat little touch. Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198086388424', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1573846650}
review:
Eu fico pensando se é esse tipo de jogo que as pessoas pensavam que iria existir lá nos anos 80, porque Waves é basicamente um jogo de Fliperama futurista e muito bem feito, os modos de jogo são bem diversificados fazendo com que dificilmente você fique entediado, a estética do jogo parece vinda do filme Tron (o que reforça ainda mais a ideia de um arcade futurista), a customização deve permitir que até gente que tenha um PC fraco possa jogar sem problemas (emborra boa parte da graça está em jogar com os gráficos no máximo e com FPS alto), a trilha sonora complementa muito bem o jogo, e o preço é até bem barato para um jogo com qualidade dessa categoria, e olha que eu já vi muito lixo feito para celular que é mais caro do que Waves).

Assim pode afirmar que Waves pode funcionar como um ótimo jogo para se jogar durante uns 20 minutos quando você não tem muito tempo para jogar alguma coisa mais complexa, ou um jogo de festa, pois como a jogabilidade é bem fácil de se aprender basta colocar um Notebook conectado em uma TV ou o próprio monitor de um Desktop e deixar seus convidados competirem pelo maior placar, eles com certeza vão se divertir muito!

author: {'steamid': '76561198013132245', 'num_games_owned': 419, 'num_reviews': 316, 'playtime_forever': 1244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1709343104}
review:
UPDATE: After buying "Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions Evolved", I can honestly say I like both games equally well.  GW3 has less contrast, making it hard to even know where your ship is occasionally, while I've never had that disorientation here.

-------------------------

This is great with a controller!  I got it at a discount when Waves 2 came out.  The graphics in this game are stunning, and the gameplay experience takes me back to the days when I played Robotron 2084 and Tempest back in the 80's - it's very fast paced and the screen can get full where the game-play becomes a flow.  It's a great feeling!

That said - don't try playing this with a keyboard.  It really doesn't do the game justice to play that way.

The game has about 8 different arcade modes.  For example, there's survival mode which just means playing as long as you can in a typical arcade fashion (slow at first and then things build up).  There's also a "bomb" mode, where you pick up a bomb and have 10 seconds to deliver it to another location before it blows up on you, and you have no other way of killing things.  Another mode only allows your guns to work if you keep within a moving area - so to level up often you have to jump out of the area and go into the level up area while not being able to shoot until you get back into the shooting area again.  There are a few more special modes like this, but the most familiar is survival mode.

I'm usually not a big fan of very frantic games, but this one really hooked me, and I think it's because the graphics are like a fireworks display - and when those fireworks are going off WHILE you are trying to navigate and stay alive, it keeps me coming back for more!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971859896', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 478, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1653340194}
review:
Играта те пленява още в първите секунди след като се пуснеш.Страхотна графика и звук, но най вече геймплей. След като завършиш ти се иска да се пуснеш отново и да се справиш по добре. Похвално е и колко много различни режими на игра са създали с отделни класации за точките. Бях я закупил още преди година, но все не оставаше време да я пробвам. Не съжалявам за това, защото има карти за размяна отскоро, въпреки че е излязла през далечната 2011. Като минус мога да отбележа липсата на кооперативен режим и това че ако нямате приятели, които да играят такъв тип игри, няма с кого да се сравнявате. Линукс поддръжка също би била от полза. 

Сега видях че има ранен достъп за втора част и определено ще взема и нея по някое време.

Забравих да отбележа, че има доста хумор в текстовете и подсказките, който те кара да играеш още и да не се отказваш. Не пропускайте да прочете How to play в играта. Успех!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007568587', 'num_games_owned': 854, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1543618717}
review:
Вот иногда поддержка разработчиков делает невероятные вещи.
"Waves" - одна из индюшек, которые оседают на аккаунтах пользователей, но в которые мало кто играет. 
Такие игры, либо получают в бандлах, либо берут со скидкой "коллекционеры".
И для меня "Waves" была лишь очередной инди, в которую я поиграл минут 30 и удалил.
И казалось бы всё, зачем возвращаться к ней. Но внезапно спустя много лет после релиза разработчик добавил карточки.

"Что ж... лишние карточки на продажу не помешают", - очевидная мысль, но вышло всё не так, как я планировал.

"Waves", сначала мне показалась, очередной музыкальной ритм-стрелялкой. На деле же она ближе к "Gemeotry Wars" и соответствующему поджанру. Враги не появляются в зависимости от интенсивности музыки и действуют, согласно заложенным скриптам путям. Музыка абсолютно ненапрягающая и, несмотря на 4-5 треков доступных в игре, она совсем не надоедает. 
Удивительно, но как правило от таких игр часто нервничаешь от постоянных смертей. "Waves" - игра стремительная, смерти в ней явление постоянное, но почему-то не испытываешь гнева. После поражения хочется пробовать режим раз за разом. Режимов - масса, причем попробовать нужно их все. Для кого-то одни будут чересчур сложными, другие же наоборот понравятся, но тут дело сноровки.

Приятно удивлен индюшкой, крайне советую любителям подобных игр. Пусть я и сыграл в неё немного, но уверяю, что если такая игра затянет хотя бы на один вечер - эмоциями она свою покупку отобьет сразу.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055367918', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1339, 'last_played': 1594584129}
review:
Приятная игра с хорошим визуалом и приятной музыкой и отличным гейплеем. Драйв создаваемый на уровне захватывает дух, а орды разьярённых разноцветных огоньков не на секунду не даст передохнуть пока счётчик жизней не упадёт до нуля.
Однозначно хорошая игра.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1551122020}
review:
Tags: Shootemup&BulletHell
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Bland gameplay despite the decent presentation. Foes can spawn on you and autokill you. Play Geometry Wars instead.

It does not have the scope of geometry wars but the spawn patterns are poorly telegpraphed sometimes spawn killing you. Sometimes provides interesting patterns. The threats are varied and often involve punching a hole out of a collision formation and escaping. The AI-style voice acting fit thematically and was pleasant to listen to. The aiming was very accurate but with a bullet spread attack that also gave some margin to dash and spray. Short lived fun and ultimately outcompeted by the better executed geometry wars games.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/310790/Geometry_Wars_3_Dimensions_Evolved/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/8400/Geometry_Wars_Retro_Evolved/

author: {'steamid': '76561198037560921', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1457358606}
review:
Залипательный твинстик-шутер на замкнутой арене. 

Играл с пиратки несколько месяцев, потом купил, потому что понравилась.
Больше всего затянул режим survival из-за бесконечно нарастающей сложности. Развивает реакцию и внимание.

Правда, в бесконечном режиме счетчик очков у меня всегда останавливался на одном и том же числе (где-то 25 минут после старта). Очки останавливались на значении ~2 147 млн.

Давно не заходил в нее и вряд-ли зайду после достигнутого.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105059120', 'num_games_owned': 320, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1610386606}
review:
[b]Introduction[/b]
Waves is a twin stick shooter I bought after having had a lot fun with Geometry Wars Retro, that game is just great even though it's very basic in design. When I installed Waves I enabled the laser which makes the game horrible, unfortunately I didn't know that's not how the game should be played. As a result I abandoned the game and regretted ever buying it. Now three years later I've changed my mind a bit.

[b]Control[/b]
You can play the game with a dual stick controller or with keyboard and mouse. I would have liked to be able to use an analog stick for moving and the mouse for aiming but unfortunately Waves doesn't support it.

[b]Gameplay[/b]
There are several game modes. The main idea is not just shoot enemies but wait until there are a bunch of them to shoot multiple enemies in short succession to get a multiplier going. This multiplier is in turn multiplied by your level which you can raise by collecting the level ups which you get from collecting energy orbs defeated enemies leave behind.

You can slow down time, while time is slowed down you score double. Every time you raise your multiplier by 10 you can use a bomb. So basically you should slow down time while bombing for big points.

[b]Conclusion[/b]
Being able to slow down time is a bit lame imo. I normally pass on games using it but I didn't know Waves had it. The game is ok, I don't find it as enjoyable as other twin stick shooters but at least it's different and the graphics are fine. The music doesn't really match the theme.

The menu items have descriptions where they explain things in a condescending matter. I'm sure it's meant in jest but I don't care for it. It was part of the reason why I gave up so quickly on this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198231493012', 'num_games_owned': 1072, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 7, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1710846976}
review:
Waves is a practically perfect arcade twin-stick shooter.  It's a brilliant gem with a great vector-style look, solid mechanics, and as much challenge as you want.  Don't be fooled by the generously low price: there nothing cheap about it.

You may wonder about Waves 2.  Waves 2 is a definite more, more, and more, but it doesn't replace its predecessor.  Waves 2 is more hectic and more generous, with more to manage, more going on, and more you can do.  It ramps up intensity but also lets you take and regenerate hits and run upgrade loadouts.  Waves 1 offers a more primal, older arcade experience where it is always kill or be killed.  As much as they are the same, the two games are different and Waves 1 is so good that it's still good sitting next to its sequel, not because the sequel does anything wrong, but because the original is just that good.

Also, if you enjoy Waves and like your arcade games complex, find your way to AtomHex.  It's not on Steam, but it is on PC and offers a completely different amazing arcade vector twin-stick shooter that needs to be enjoyed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198326392315', 'num_games_owned': 338, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1242, 'last_played': 1536460265}
review:
基本スコアタゲーですが、実績解除を目標に進めていけば、徐々に自然とゲーム内で要求されるモーションパターンを体で覚えていけます。
そういった意味では難易度調整は、飽きが来なくて常にほどよい緊張感を保ちつつ脳汁沢山放出しながらプレイできる絶妙な加減です。基本的に爆破ループを構築するゲームシステムなので、爽快感抜群です。一時的に使えるスローモーション機能は、絶体絶命ピンチ時の回避手段、もしくはコンボの繋ぎに利用するのですが、有名映画マトリッ〇クスの弾避けシーンさながら緊迫感抜群な数秒を体験できます。（スローモーション時にBGMもスローになるのも、雰囲気にマッチしててとても良いです）
私はキーボードとマウスでプレイしましたが、連続長時間プレイしたため、左クリック長押しマウスの指の付け根が悲鳴をあげています。左手の器用さに自信のある方なら、キーコンフィグにより右クリックを左手小指にシフトキーで割り当ててもいいかもしれません。
あの～1時間程度でやめるつもりだったんですけどォ・・・

author: {'steamid': '76561198053953472', 'num_games_owned': 1944, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1530305710}
review:
Imagine a Twin-Stick Shooter, except boring. Waves has decent music but the actual sound when you kill enemies is not only unsatisfying but also annoying. This alone would ruin the game if not for the fact that shooting doesn't feel like it has any impact, making the game even less enjoyable.

Pretty sure the female announcer is just Glados from Portal, this was pretty distracting.

There's seven different gameplay modes, plenty of variety if you play Waves. I wish you luck, you won't be competing against me as I do not wish to spend any more time on a game that just isn't fun to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989178492', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3991, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3605, 'last_played': 1544917323}
review:
An excellent example of a simple idea done really, bloody, well. With only one arena, two weapons and a handful of game modes, Waves offers a streamlined twin-stick shooter experience, but rather than leave the game feeling sparse, this allows its triumphs to shine through without clutter. Gameplay is well balanced and addictive, with enough twists through the different game modes to keep things interesting. The sense of “flow” the gameplay instils is complemented beautifully by the ambient soundtrack and a feature I particularly like is the option to change each of the game’s sound effects to pentatonic notes that harmonise with these tracks. It doesn’t affect the gameplay, but is a good indication of the attention to detail Squid In A Box has put into this game.

Waves is not without its issues however. The main ones that come to mind are:
[list]
[*]The HUD looks very flashy but can be a little hard to read in the heat of the moment, especially if transparency is enabled.
[*]The ‘Challenges’ mode only displays the objectives for each round after the round has finished. They all basically equate to [spoiler]“[i]get a high multiplier and do it quickly[/i]”[/spoiler] but this still seems like an odd decision on Squid In A Box’s part.
[*]Some issues with preferences in the games settings not being retained through updates, I haven’t given much investigation to this yet so it may be easily resolved or a problem on my end. 
[/list]
These are all fairly minor problems though and haven’t stopped me cracking Waves out whenever I have other gamers over or half an hour to kill. Overall, Waves is a streamlined and polished gem of a twin-stick shooter that stays fun long after you expect it to. Definitely worth its low price if you’re a fan of the genre or looking to get into it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009318249', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 750, 'last_played': 1511491192}
review:
いわゆるツインスティックシューター、敵の攻撃をかわして撃破していく目的は同じです。
自機は「玉」であり、転がすように操作するため方向転換に慣性の影響があります。
『Geometry Wars』のようにきびきび操作したい人にとってはこの点が少し不満に感じるかもしれませんが、慣れの範疇であると思います。

多彩なゲームモードに加え良質なBGMなどと高評価ポイントが多々あります。フルコントロラーサポートもありがたいです。
不満点をあげるとするとBGMの種類が2～3曲だけと壊滅的に少ない点と、比較的簡単にカンストまで到達できるのでスコアアタック重視の人は萎えるかもしれません。

ちなみに「2」が出ていますがゲーム性が少し違うので、2がでてるならそっちでいいやとならずにこっちもぜひ購入しましょう。なにより安い！

[h1]Пройди все волны[/h1]

Суть игры - уничтожать гексагончики (соты), в пределах одной области, при этом выжить самому. Я лишь скажу, что это очень драйвовая и хардкорная игра, отличный таймкиллер, с местами эпилептическим графоном. И да, если вы в погоне за легкими для выполнения на 100% играми - проходите мимо. Очень сложно. А игра годная.

review:
好玩的确是挺好玩的。
难度有点高，对我这种老年人很有挑战性。
宣传片里音乐真的好听，但是实际上这么好听的就宣传片里的那一首，其他4首音量又小，本身节奏又催眠。
你说一个Shoot'em up的曲子听不清还催眠这还玩个飞机啊。
玩了半个小时音乐翻来覆去就那么几首，跑去一看Soundtrack里面一共就6首曲子，游戏内一共5首，最后一首是bonus track。

author: {'steamid': '76561198070572718', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 421, 'last_played': 1593097499}
review:
I can only think of one word when I play this game: Flow.

Waves is an awesome arcade-styled game that takes us back to the nostalgic days while giving us a fresh new look.

Pros:
- Movements and controls are pretty satisfying.
- The reflective background and awesome objects with pretty colours compensate for the plain and simple environment.
- There are various game modes that are pretty fun.
- The price is on point, and the game is extremely affordable during discounts.

Cons:
- Limited content.
- There's a game mode called Hold, and it's too laggy. I find it difficult to play this game mode because of the low FPS.
- Can't play too long. It can really strain my eyes.
- The game only has 6 songs, and I only liked 2 of them. The other 4 are just plain boring.

Overall, it's a nice game to play every once in awhile, and it's a nice fun package for 15-30 mins of game time. If you're a fan of arcade games, do buy this game because I'd give it a 7.5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066827082', 'num_games_owned': 175, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 391, 'last_played': 1581739131}
review:
Great little game that I picked up while it was on sale; Every now and then I'll buy a load of the cheapest games I can find and give them a shot.

I thoroughly enjoy almost all aspects of this game. From the crisp clean retro/neon looks to the clutch gameplay, I'll always fit in a game or to of Waves if I find myself with nothing else to do.

The soundtrack is very neat and I actually purchased it not long after the game itself....

...however, it's been starting to get on my nerves as of late. There's nothing wrong with the music - it suits the game very well, it just gets a little repetitive after a while.

All around a very well made game. 9/10 from me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065706778', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1509033369}
review:
This review is for those who are unsure whether they should buy "another" shmup game.

I am a big fan of Geometry Wars, and also an indie developer dedicated to making twin-stick shooters.
I found out about Waves a few years ago, I tried to get into it but I didn't understand the mechanics enough to find what's fun in it.

We were trying to make our own shmup, largely inspired by Geometry Wars, and while searching around the internet we found a few interesting blog posts that explained some in depth mechanics of "Waves". These in-depth analyses explained why they believed that the score system and some other mechanics in Waves are better than GW.

This convinced me to give Waves a second chance. I spent some time on it, and it started to grow on me. The thing is - this is pretty common with shmup's that have their own unique systems. After playing it for a few hours, I realized that it is actually not so similar to Geometry Wars. It was super fun too, in it's own unique way.

I often encounter a comment "it is just another shooter game", "it is a Geometry Wars clone", "it's Super Smash TV" or "it's Crimsonland". Players have a hard time seeing the differences, figuring out the depth. But it is actually us, designers, who need to think more about this, and present our games in a better, more clear way.

So after playing many shmup games, I am giving Waves a huge thumbs up, and huge recommendation. It has many interesting game modes, great gameplay flow, and it looks and feels amazing. It is unique in many ways, and you should give it a chance no matter how many shmup games you already played. 

If you are also looking for something similar, it would be super cool if you would check out our game Rocking Pilot, and share with us some of your impressions. Thanks! http://store.steampowered.com/app/593680/Rocking_Pilot/

author: {'steamid': '76561197986922743', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1485096666}
review:
This game is a bit too bland, generic, and abstract. First off, the story:

In some games, story is presented as a series of characters with lines of dialogue, and/or events that happen. In other games, story is emergent, in that you create your own narrative based on choices you make. This game has none of that. This is a series of minigames with their own rules and challenges, but they're all meant to be played in short bursts. The result is that you're constantly getting snapped back to a menu, unless you're really really good. I admit I'm not the best at these types of games, even though I enjoy them. What some games do, to compensate for lack of player skill (twitch reflexes) is add RPG or progression elements and difficulty level. So if you're not good enough to make it 30+ minutes without getting snapped back to a menu, add an upgrade system and a difficulty slider so you can grind out some boosts to give yourself an edge. This game doesn't have that. If you want your sessions to last longer, it's on you.

The controls are fine. Some people complain about how your avatar (a ball) has physics with inertia and such. That doesn't really bother me too much, but maybe it contributes to the difficulty. Several times I'd find myself getting smacked down in ways that made me wonder if it was poor reflexes or my avatar was just sluggish to correct.

Finally, there's the art style. It's 3D neon geometric shapes chasing you around a circular field, with a honeycomb grid underneath that moves in and out of view. There are particles flying everywhere, and when you make kills, harmless bright blue bolts fly out of them and chase you. This makes you feel like you're constantly getting shot at even though you're just collecting "XP". (There is a leveling system but all it does is increases the difficulty, it doesn't give you any new skills or stats.) Sometimes enemies charge you at crazy speeds from very short distances, but you can only survive one hit. So your brain is constantly trying to figure out if the things coming at you are friend or foe, and it gets confusing. The abstract art style makes me feel disconnected, unmoved, so I'm less motivated to keep playing.

To summarize: This isn't my favorite twin-stick shooter. It has a few cool features (like the time slow that charges up as you make kills, or the bomb that becomes available when you get a 10x multiplier) but to me, the punishing difficulty combined with an abstract art style and lack of progression or difficulty options means I'll be turning elsewhere for entertainment. The short play sessions where you get tossed back to a menu every few minutes makes me just want to head for the exit.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968587849', 'num_games_owned': 1004, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1546089364}
review:
Just a solid and maybe underrated twin-stick shooter on Steam.  Akin to Geometry Wars in its retro/minimalist visual style and game play.  I especially like the Crunch Time mode where you have 3 minutes to score as many points as possible.  The dynamic scoring system adds another layer for optimal high scoring tactics.

Comparing your high scores in game with friends is adds to the competitive fun.

Runs at ~30 fps on my low end AMD A6-5200 APU laptop with the visuals set to low.  Also in my opinion, an Xbox or similar controller is highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038133830', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1522286960}

author: {'steamid': '76561198125521228', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 427, 'last_played': 1689735506}
review:
Waves, en palabras simples.

El area del juego es circular, el cual es mas grande que la pantalla (lo que ve el usuario), por lo tanto, tendremos que movernos a traves del area de juego. En el controlamos una esfera blanca, de la cual podemos movernos y disparar. La camara se mueve junto con la esfera. Por lo tanto, solo tendremos que que controlar las teclas " A-W-S-D ", click "IZQUIERDO" para disparar un unico tipo de disparo y click "DERECHO" el cual nos permite ralentizar el tiempo por breve lapso, para sacar mas de un apuro.

Asi de simple!!!

Aparte de eso, el juego posee diferentes modos de juego: survival, contrareloj,etc... que añaden pequeñas cosas al gameplay base, pero sin marcar mucha diferencia.

En cuanto al visual, tanto los colores, explosiones, etc... no causan molestia, lo cual se agradece.Ya que en algunos juegos de este estilo, la cantidad de enemigos, luces, etc... puede ser realmente molesta. el cual este no es el caso.

En el apartado sonoro, lo unico que me disgusto es la musica, no porque sea mala, sino, por que algunas pistas son un poco calmadas para el estilo de juego del gameplay (a mi juicio), y hay veces que se producen lagunas. en las que no suena ningun tema. 

Obviamente, este tipo de juegos no es para todos. Pero si te gustan o te llama la atencion. LO RECOMIENDOO!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198211011373', 'num_games_owned': 3453, 'num_reviews': 127, 'playtime_forever': 1319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1490697855}
review:
在街机版射击游戏里，竟然也有突突突的爽快类型，就是这个叫做waves的游戏。

操控上，控制器是用双摇杆控制自己的“球球”滚动和射击方向，两个单键释放冲击波技能和减速，比较复古；键盘则是鼠标控制射击和减速，键盘控制方向与技能。看似简单实则不然，初期还是比较爽快的清关游戏，到了后期完全是考验反应能力的弹幕游戏有木有啊。。另外，这居然是虚幻引擎制作的，在游戏内某些地方就可以看出不同于U3D的地方。

就是这样一个简单而不简单的游戏，让人玩了很上瘾。猫某曾打过25min的rush模式，这25分钟全程都在盯着屏幕，神经一直都是紧绷的，达成成就后，赶脚手麻眼花，但依然觉得倍儿爽有木有？

目前这款游戏应该还有包包散key，不推荐直接从商店购买...来来，开涮！

author: {'steamid': '76561198105072082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 39, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1488293195}

author: {'steamid': '76561198146407333', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2772, 'last_played': 1647085386}
review:
[h1]Who doesn't love Arcade-Games?[/h1]

Waves is a typical example for one of these. You have to eliminate the opposing balls as a ball. Sounds boring but this is not the case at all.
The Fun-part starts simply by the fact that there are several gamemodes. I personally just play three of them because they are the best in my opinion.

[table]
[tr]
[th][b]Mode[/b][/th]
[th][b]Description[/b][/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
[th]Crunch Time[/th]
[th]Achieve as many points as possible within 3 minutes[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
[th]Survival[/th]
[th]The round ends as you lose your 3 lives. Besides trying not to die, you try to score as high as possible.[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
[th]Rush[/th]
[th]A mix out of the upper two modes: You have 2 minutes, for every achieved level you will get 10 seconds, for every time you die you will lose 10 seconds.[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
[th]Other Gamemodes[/th]
[th]I didn't really play them, because the upper three are the best in my opinion. :)[/th]
[/tr]
[/table]

[table]

[/tr]

Conclusion: A great casual game with fitting music and a slight bit of addiction potential.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132303182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 731, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 642, 'last_played': 1552558699}
review: 묘하게 도전욕구를 자극하는 게임. 가격대비 굉장히 즐거운 게임이긴 하지만....현재 2편이 나왔으므로 이 게임을 사는것보단 그걸 사는걸 추천드립니다. 그런데 80퍼 할인이니까 천원밖에 안하고.....사도 괜찮을 겁니다. 이 게임은 단순해보이지만 나름 화려한 그래픽과 다양한 적들 그리고 슬로우모드와 자폭(?) 기능이 게임을 한층 더 재미있게 만들어줍니다. 이런 점수위주의 게임을 할때 우리는 늘 키보드를 쾅쾅 내려치게 되죠. 아 조금만 더하면 신기록이었는데!! 아 조금만 더하면 도전과제 달성인데!! 이렇게 화가나서 게임을 껏다가도 한게임만 더하고 오늘은 그만하자 라고 생각하게 만드는게 바로 이 게임이죠.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078784788', 'num_games_owned': 542, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 641, 'last_played': 1661624687}
review:
I honestly couldnt think of a single complaint about this game. It's pretty much everything I could ever want from a twin stick shooter.

One thing unique to this game that I really liked was how the bomb loadout worked: instead of picking bombs up and stockpiling them, you can only use them whenever you reach high enough hit combos. This forces you to think ahead and time your kills, and on higher levels things get very frenetic with you dropping bombs every few seconds. There's also a slow-mo ability that recharges automatically, which is another helpful feature.

Plus the controls are smooth and responsive, the graphics shiny and colorful, the music excellent (accompanied by a cool Glados-like robot voice), and there are enough game modes, achievements and leaderboards to keep you occupied for many hours. A very solid and satisfying shoot-em-up experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040884867', 'num_games_owned': 2422, 'num_reviews': 901, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1491686292}
review:
[b]Definately one of the best twin-stick arena shooters I've played.[/b] There are few frills here - just good old fashioned schmup fun. The controls are tight. The battles are fair, and the music is good.

[b]Pros:[/b]
+Tight controls
+Several game modes, and they are all pretty fun
+Music is high energy and very solid
+Graphics are nice, and while things get hectic, I can always discern what is going on
+I love chasing my Steam friends scores (friend me if you wanna get crunked)
+Price is too cheap

[b]Cons:[/b]
-It doesn't bring anything new to the table - which is usually a [i]huge[/i] con for me, but in this case, I'm cool with it

[b]Excellent game if you are into this genre.[/b] Well worth full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260358573', 'num_games_owned': 343, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1483445715}
review:
绝对是我至今玩过的最棒的同类游戏，比那些打飞机什么的强多了，我每次玩的时候都不相信这是一个我花4块钱买到的游戏。
+画面：10/10
+色彩：11/10
+视觉效果：10/10
+音效：9/10
+毒性：10/10
+内置全球排名系统，玩了两天，大部分模式都排到全球一万名左右了。。。

强烈建议用手柄，
有好多个模式，不过主要就是survive，bombing，challange这三种
屏幕下方是经验条，满了就升一级，同时屏幕左侧的multi倍数+1，随着等级提升难度加大，每升10级加一条命。
特色：
1.子弹时间：闪避神器
2.炸弹：本作的一个灵魂组成，每10combo可用一个，可以说是得高分的唯一途径，几个炸弹连爆随便弄出个50+combo，分数瞬间涨十几万，而且视觉效果超炫

就这么多，强烈推荐，打折4块，原价也值
10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198147572953', 'num_games_owned': 694, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1651663889}
review:
부담되지 않는 가격, 2011년에 나왔다고는 조금 믿기지 않는 멋진 그래픽.

게임 플레이 자체도 플레이를 해볼수록 빠져들게 되는 경향이 있었던 것 같습니다.

아직 그리 많은 플레이를 해보지는 않았지만, 개인적으로 두고두고 하기에

정말 좋은 게임인 것 같습니다. 아케이드 / 슈팅 게임 좋아하시는 분들께 추천해드려요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143878602', 'num_games_owned': 429, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1549329705}
review:
Grafikleri çok muhteşem.
Böyle oyunlara bayılıyorum etrafında uçuşan şeylere değilde kendine odaklanarak oynamak zorunda oluyorsun.
oynarken zevk alıyorum.
Oyun modu çok fazla ama hepsi güzel değil.
Rekabetçi bir yapısıda var ama o kadar önplanda değil. 
Eğer indirim dönemi alırsanız gerçekten 1-2 lira gibi komik fiyata geliyor. 
Steam listenizde bulunması gereken bir oyun dursun, yükleyin canınız mı sıkıldı açın hemen oynayın. Gerçekten fiyatına değer bir oyun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032632811', 'num_games_owned': 889, 'num_reviews': 749, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1467261518}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198014610676', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 181, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1467428129}
review:
Es un clon mas economico del Geometry Wars.
Los modos de juego y las pequeñas diferencias en las mecanicas realmente no valen la pena tu tiempo ni tu dinero...

Los elementos en pantalla son muy dificiles de diferenciar a simple vista. La ayuda visual para alertar el lugar donde van a aparecer los enemigos es pesima y muchas veces terminas muriendo por falta de informacion. Por otra parte, el porcentaje del mapa que queda fuera del cuadro de la camara es tan grande que muchas veces perdes el chain porque parece que la arena esta vacia.

Artisticamente el estilo chiptune (asociado a un estilo retro lo-fi minimalista) no es coherente con la estetica tron que propone el juego (asociado a algo abstracto, futurista y sofisticado). Los limites de la arena no son claras ni estan bien definidos por lo que es dificil calcular cuan cerca de la parede estas y si queda o no espacio para evadir enemigos por los laterales. Los pilares decorativos que aparecen alrededor de los limites de la arena se comen una parte de tu avatar.

El hitbox es enorme para la velocidad con la que se mueve el jugador. Mas alla de que el bullet time ayuda un poco para esquivar, el hitbox deberia ser un poco mas chico que el modelo para compensar el lento tiempo de reaccion propio de los seres humanos.

La cantidad de mecanicas aleatorias que tiene el juego es suficientemente abrumadora como para no considerar competitivo este juego. Los spawns son aleatorios, los tipos de enemigo son aleatorios, los movimientos de los enemigos son aleatorios, los spawns de los multiplicadores son aleatorios... la lista sigue.

No veo realmente razones para haber comprado este juego, realmente lo hice por impulso. Hay tantos otros juegos similares mucho mas entretenidos y bien logrados en Steam que considero que hice una pésima compra.

Los requerimientos para el juego son brutales considerando lo simple que son los graficos, la comunidad es muy pequeña y ya casi nadie juega... en fin. Lo unico positivo que le veo al juego es que lo tenga algun otro amigo y competir en la tabla de posiciones.

Compren Geomtery Wars, el original, clasico, nada se le compara. Y si quieren probar algo mas moderno y sofisticado les recomiendo probar el Devil Daggers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135538727', 'num_games_owned': 2745, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1466203856}
review:
It's a 'twin-stick shooter'   i-i

Nice game to pick-up and play for when you have that spare 15-30 minutes to fill.
Heaps of different game modes (including not shooting, just dodging) and achievements.
Also, Steam Friend List scoring leaderboards! xD

Since your ship is spherical in shape and creates ripples in space as you move the movement is similar to rolling a ping-pong ball around on a plate of jelly (especially when trying to make sharp turns). So, it is unique in that respect and you do get use to it.

I quite like the gameplay, it makes you think fast and works on your timing and reaction skills.

Recommended if you have a twin-stick controller!

author: {'steamid': '76561198046676922', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1466274031}
review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VK6JM78NH2w

Inicialmente não dei muita bola, mais depois que percebi que é necessário ter um pouco de habilidade para movimentar e atirar ao mesmo tempo, o jogo foi me envolvendo. O que me chamou a atenção é esse espaço mínimo, logo não tem para onde correr apenas movimentar-se pelo círculo para não ser atingido. A música ajuda a dar um up na jogabilidade e vai ficando mais rápido ao avançar de nível. Mas o que poderia ter é multiplayer, mesmo que não fosse no mesmo cenário poderia dar um gás ao jogo. Os efeitos de luz são aleatórios dando uma impressão de constante mudança no cenário. Nesse game basicamente você vai testar sua habilidade para superar sua pontuação anterior, como era nos árcades do passado onde você ao final da partida colocava suas inicias no score da máquina com sorte se ela tinha memória a competição era garantida.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015848436', 'num_games_owned': 595, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1364, 'last_played': 1670360067}
review:
This game is addictive, I mean seriously addictive! Once you start playing you will have to find a way to force yourself to stop or you will be playing the whole day. Its a classic top-down / shoot-em-up survival game (Like crimsonland). The achievements are truly challenging to get but the sense of reward at the end is really amazing, you feel like you've climbed a mountain, fell down 60 of 65 times, given up 4 times and finally succeeded the last time, then you go back for more.

I recommend this game to anyone who likes to have their heart pounding in their throat, I have one suggestion to make in regards to this. The game dev's should occasionally clear the highscore board, cause seeing the numbers there could discourage a lot of players(Specially after counterstop)

Game is a 9/10 for me, the lack of different weapons is the only thing that really brings it down, but the rest of the game is 5-star quality!

author: {'steamid': '76561198179962105', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1463193370}
review:
I have a soft spot for twin-stick shooters: they're some of the purest arcade style shooters available, and with the simplistic control scheme joined with the even simpler gameplay style, I'm very rarely disappointed with them. Is Waves worth a check out? You betcha.

For anyone that doesn't know, a twin-stick shooter is exactly that: the left stick controls you, the right stick aims where you shoot. Easy peasy. The arcade classic Asteroids can be seen as one of, if not the, first twin stick. So with Waves the premise remains the same: see brightly colored geometric shape, aim at it, and watch a pretty display of particles explode out from it. The more shapes you blow up, the more points you get. Blow up enough shapes in quick succesion, the higher combo you attain. High combo means more points. Points are life.

Waves breaks up the monotony by implementing a slow down mechanic based upon an ever replenshing gauge: use it to get out of hairy situations or to rack up bonus points. Waves also utilizes a bomb system in which you're awarded bombs based upon your score, but only for a short moment. Miss your chance to use it and it's gone.

Waves has a nice selection of gameplay modes, but if there was one issue I had with it, it's that they're all a little short (except for Survival of course.) Each mode has its own score boards, which is cool, and the variety keeps the game from becoming boring. 

The visuals are nice, the music is pleasing, and the gameplay is tight. If you like Geometry Wars, or simple arcade shooters in general, this is certainly worth the purchase.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028550194', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1546995995}
review:
Yksinkertaista ideaa noudattava vauhdikas toimintapeli jossa twinstick räiskintää erinomaisen musiikin, robottiäänen ja kirkkaiden valojen kanssa. Tässä pelissä pyritään kasaamaan pisteitä ja vain pisteitä. Mitä pidempään selviää ilman osumaa, sitä korkeammalle kombokerroin nousee ja sitä enemmän pisteitä saa kasaan. Tämä idea on toteutettu erinomaisesti.
Yksinkertaisten pelien joukossa Waves erottuu edukseen siinä, että se ei kärsi kovinkaan erikoisista ongelmista vaan tekee sen hyvin mitä aikookin tehdä.

Toiminta pelissä on vauhdikasta ja mukana on muutama hauska lisä joista näppärin on slowmo jossa maailma hidastuu. Ammuttavaa ryskää päälle kokoajan ja jatkuvalla syötöllä. Värikoodi kertoo siitä miten aggressiviisesti erilaiset pallot tulevat päälle ja kun ruutu on täynnä tavaraa, niin reagointiaika on muutamia sekunteja.

Waves on monipuolinen samalla tavalla kuin esimerkiksi Tetris. Pelissä on yksi idea mutta samoin kuin Tetris, tämä peli on tehnyt sen hyvin. Waves on peli jota pelaa joko sen yhden nopean hetken kun ei ole muuta tekemistä tai sitten pitkän session kun peli koukuttaa.
Ehkä se suurin miinus pelissä on siinä että se vaatii tiettyä sopeutumista. Ammuskursori liikkuu joko liian hitaasti tai liian nopeasti, mutta siihen alkaa tottua kun peli pelaa pidemmän aikaa, mutta mikäli peliä pelaa hetken ja seuraavaan kertaan on vähän aikaa, niin toiminta ei tule välttämättä ihan selkärangasta.

Viimeisenä puolena pelissä on erinomainen tunnelma ja maailma. Musiikki ja tehosteet ovat todella hyviä ja robottiääni pelissä sopii tähän kaikkeen just eikä melkein. Pelissä on sitä asennetta joka vain toimii ja tekee pelistä viihdyttävän ja hauskan pelata.


+ Toiminta
+ Tyyli
+ Idea

- Asennoituminen
- Vain yksi idea


Arvosana: 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198028719903', 'num_games_owned': 7606, 'num_reviews': 286, 'playtime_forever': 219, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 219, 'last_played': 1462498695}
review:
[h1]Connected.[/h1]
Waves - мясцовый Twin-Stick Shooter, несложный в освоение и крайне мощный в плане скилл-капа для игрока.
Зайдя в игру, я принялся отыгрывать режимы, которые были доступны (их чуть меньше десятка), постепенно понимая механику и тонкости. Но как бы не старался, всё равно видел что кто-то из френд-листа выжимал в тысячи раз счет лучше.
Тут наступило понимание, что я даже не раскрываю весь потенциал игры. Стал заигрывать до дыр, пока в итоге с 20-40 попытки, но всё же не переплевывал свой френдлист из играющих, дабы действительно мог сам себе сказать, что играть таки научился.

Игра жутко простая в плане механики. Вы управляете 3D шариком, катящимся по гексагонам. От ваших выстрелов (или взрывов, если вы в другом режиме) всё переливается всеми цветами радуги с каждым новым попаданием. Более того в игре есть замедление времени на ПКМ. Итого вы стреляете ЛКМ, замедляете время на ПКМ, и управляете WASD, а также можете сделать большой бум на Space, если у вас комбо-серия.

В игре предлагается пачка противников. Некких шаров и других геометрических фигур, которые имеют своё поведение

[h1]Список противников:[/h1]
→ Оранжевые шары самонаводятся, фиолетовые
→ Розовые и малиновые бесцельно дрейфуют на уровне
→ Белые хаотичные сгустки самонаводятся, летят медленно и с сохранением инерции
→ Красные просто "перекати поле", куб перекатывается с одной стороны на другую, пока вы не станете напротив одной из его сторон и тогда он сделает резкий рывок в стенку, пытаясь впечатать и вас
→ Зеленый Гексагон (шестиугольник), который работает по принципу саморазмножения, и пока вы не забьете главную "клетку" этого организма или вообще весь, то он будет продолжать расти и разрастаться на этом небольшом уровне

[h1]Чем цепляет:[/h1]
+ Адски красивая. Можно подумать, что это страшный сон эпилептика, но даже среди таких игр без меры попадаются и такие как Waves, где черту не перешли.
+ Easy to learn, hard to master. Вы можете играть вдоволь, но сделать действительно восхитительный счет потребует очень много практики.
+ Таблицы рейтинга: личные, локальные, по френд-листу стима, по миру. Для меня было большим подогреванием интереса то, что кто-то ещё больше имел счет в столь незатейливой игре, поэтому я играл до тех пор, пока не побил рекорды списка друзей в каждом режиме.
+ Классная динамичная музыка, поддерживающая игровой процесс
+ Много игровых режимов, каждый со своей таблицей рекордов

[h1]Недостатки:[/h1]
- Игровые режимы. Их много, но они не сильно таки дают разнообразия игре. Геймплей меняется, но фундамент недвижим.
- Нет чего-то вроде прохождения. Это как аркадный автомат - можно играть сколько угодно, пока не проиграете. Весь смысл - набрать больше очков. Я был бы не против чего-то вроде небольшой кампании.
- Противников немало, но они не меняются даже между режимами, поэтому всегда всё одно и то же

Маленькая, но классная во всех аспектах игра, которая бывает на большой скидке и определенно стоит внимания любителей аркад, динамики и красоты.

[h1]Оценка:  A[/h1]

[h1]Connection Lost.[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198032085715', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1666308123}
review:
This is my favorite twin-stick shooter game by far [this coming from a Geometry Wars vet]. The gameplay is excellent, the music draws you in, the ambience is breathtaking, the brilliant display of explosions and sparks as you chase the highscore: ALL OF IT IS TREMENDOUS. I definately suggest playing this game in a dark room as it gets only better at sucking you into itself. Simple, addictive, its simply addicting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100910014', 'num_games_owned': 1609, 'num_reviews': 365, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1696361370}
review:
Waves eh?

Olas,ondas,oleadas...tiene muchos significados,es un juego tipo arcade bastante sencillo
que consiste en conseguir multiplicadores de puntuación,para doblarla,triplicarla,etc...
cuenta con un elenco amplio de modos de juego desde "crunch time" hasta "hold"
en cuanto a elementos jugables dispondremos de camara lenta y destruyendo concretas
figuras geometricas podremos activar una bomba que borrara todo lo que haya en
pantalla con ello conseguiremos multiplicadores para aumentar nuestra puntuación considerablemente

Lo recomiendo y aprecio el esfuerzo de desarrollar este juego aunque parezca sencillo a priori

author: {'steamid': '76561198064720487', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1708141137}
review:
Polished twin-stick shooter with addicting gameplay, colorful presentation, and incredible soundtrack (seriously, I sometimes play the game just to hear the music).  Although it comes with a handful of other modes, most of them are the same game with different objectives.  Despite lack of content, the content it does offer is solid.  Not mind-blowing, but will leave a smile on your face.

If you enjoyed Geometry Wars or enjoy topping high scores, this is the game for you.  I wouldn't pay full price unless you dearly love the genre.  I would highly recommend waiting for a sale of $1 or less and kill a few hours with it.

review: For fans of Geometry Wars and similar twin-stick shooters, there's a lot to enjoy with Waves. The inclusion of a slow-motion powerup and bomb system based on kills and kill combos respectively make for a uniquely flowing experience. Although the selection of game modes does not differ significantly from Waves' competitors, there is enough variety to offer great replay value for fans of the genre. Highly recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198066552374', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1491967873}
review:
[b]A twin-stick shooter with a calm, polished, cybernetic aesthetic, Waves is a solid member of the genre with interesting mechanics but limited content.[/b]

Waves is a game where you control a sphere rolling within a cylinder, shooting a spray of bullets with the aim of removing an array of shapes which you are motivated to kill because A) They give you points, and B) You blow up and stop moving when they hit you. The game has a few interesting auxilliary mechanics. First is the buffer which is a rechargable bullet-time power that is a main panic button, and the second is bombs that become available based on your combo multiplier. If your combo breaks than the bomb disappears so there is an interesting anxiety if saving a bomb, and also a chance to chain together a large number of bombs for maximum efficacy. As difficulty ramps up and the chances of missing decreases due to the large number of baddies on the screen, bombs become more and more frequent, which leads to a fun chaotic dynamic when things get tougher.

This game has a small, understated, relaxing techno themed soundtrack that goes well with the hex-gridded environment and the polygonal, computer themed enemies. It took me a while to appreciate the game's design as there is quite a bit of subtlety, but in the end I appreciated the vision.

Though ultimately enjoyable there are some minor gripes. First, I can't pause between death and respawn, though often I wish to simply restart the level after an early untimely death. Also, the challenge mode often perplexingly doesn't trigger success for the challenes appropriately. Further, the UI is a bit crowded and oddly designed. For example, a high score is often displayed proiminently in the middle right of the screen, while the current score is displayed on the middle left of the screen. There is a lot of data on the screen. Aesthetically it works in a sort of augmented vision manner, but practically I would like to reduce a lot of this clutter. My worst is criticism is Ithat he amount of content is limited. Many game modes play out quite similarly and there is only the one stage. After a few hours you've seen it all, and you may not want to grind the same set up repeatedly.

Though unfair due Waves' differing mechanics, I feel this game asks to be compared with installments of Geometry Wars. If you liked Geometry Wars, then you will like Waves. If you didn't, you won't. If you've never played Geometry Wars than Waves is a cheap introduction to the genre when it is on sale. The game is a solid effort, and personally, I'm excited for the sequel, which as of this writing is in Early Access.

[i]Waves are a physical phenomena resulting from specific excitation in a medium. Most waves involving the medium itself are limited by the speed of sound in that medium, while the travel of optical and electromagnetic waves depends on the speed of light in that medium. This review brought to you in part using waves from [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Original_Curators_Group#curation]Original Curator Group[/url].[/i]
