author: {'steamid': '76561197997801929', 'num_games_owned': 2907, 'num_reviews': 406, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1453346280}
review: Waves is a great twin-stick Geometry Wars clone with a lot of replayability thanks to the achievements and leaderboards and variety of game modes.  It has good music with some [spoiler]Kefka laughter[/spoiler] mixed in. The menu system is a smooth transition between the game and itself, allowing the player to not feel as slowed-down by losing a game or switching game modes.  The visuals are very nice but ultimately too shiny (for the sake of making sure you destroyed all the tiny, yellow orbs).  I also think the game could use more game modes and content, but for how cheap it is, I'm very happy with the amount of content.

Eu gostei muito do jogo, mesmo sendo bem simples sua jogabilidade e não tendo gráficos bons é super divertido!

Não sei porque porém ele me lembrou um pouco o Touhou :)

Contras -

Bom No geral irei dar 7/10.
Recomendadissímo :D!

author: {'steamid': '76561198139006148', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1447641463}
review:
[b]Quick Breakdown:[/b] A twin stick shooter with a couple different modes of play. Its key gimmick is the ability to slow down time for a few seconds. It’ll kill an hour, but not much more.
[b]Length:[/b] 1 hour
[b]Genre:[/b] Twin Stick Shooter
[b]Score:[/b] 5.5/10

[b]Full Review:[/b] [i]Waves[/i] is a twin stick shooter in the vein of [i]Geometry Wars[/i] (the first two that is, not so much the third), from which it derives obvious influence. The core gameplay is much the same, pilot a shape with one joy stick, shoot with the other, and destroy different shapes on the map to earn points.

[i]Waves[/i] has a few differences though. Instead of having a set number of smart bombs, you earn a bomb whenever you get a combo of 10, and you only have a few seconds to use it before it goes away. You also can slow down time for a few seconds, allowing you to pick off enemies that are too close or maneuver away with greater ease. You can only do this for a few seconds at a time, and then it will need to recharge before you can use it again.

The game features a few different modes of play, none of which are anything groundbreaking. A time limited mode to see how many points you can score in 3 minutes, a survival mode to see how long you can last before you bite the bullet, and a few others.

I got about an hour of play out of the game before I got bored of it. So if you’ve already played [i]Geometry Wars[/i] and need another twin stick shooter, this’ll fill an hour. If you haven’t, you’re much better off getting [i]Geometry Wars 3[/i] instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028178533', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1451068898}
review: Do you like insanely complex and visually striking dual stick shooters? Then look no further. Normally I don't like games without customization, score driven or arcadey-feeling top down shooters. In fact, I ususally hate them. The permadeth reminds me of all the frustrated moments I spent in mcdonalds playing galaga when I was a kid, and normally they get really sickening, really fast. Waves is the only exception. I've already logged a few hours on it, and being the noob I am I die, a lot. But the visuals, the challanging but deceptively  simple gameplay, and the complexity of the enemies makes me want more. Slowing down time and setting off your bomb (completely controlled by building combos mind you) is the difference between life as death as the game goes on. Seven different game modes lets you choose what means of firey neon death you want to go out on. In short, the game is beautiful, insanely difficult, and heartpoundingly fun. On top of it all, it's probably the best bang for your buck you'll get in a long time, especially with the sale going on. If you don't have it, get it. Now. Don't even finish reading this. Buy. It's a 10/10 in my books, and by the looks of it I'm not the only one. Thank you Squid in a box. Your sarcasticly beautiful programming and commentary just made this sale worthwhile.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034714235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 1620, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1698665195}

author: {'steamid': '76561197994253280', 'num_games_owned': 587, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 615, 'last_played': 1388499469}
review: When it comes to twin-stick shooters, there's not many games that can beat Waves. It's fast, pretty, intense and an incredibly satisfying game. A handful of simple mechanics come together into a score attack masterpiece.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119808516', 'num_games_owned': 1854, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1440762750}
review:
2D全方位シューター

説明によるとネオサイバースペースでバグやウイルスをひたすら攻撃して倒していく設定ですが，自分は生体内で増殖するウイルスを攻撃するイメージでやってました
敵の数が多く色も派手で爽快感があります
10連コンボごとにボムを一回発射できるので，囲まれたときにもうまく立ち回れば一掃できます
いくつかのゲームモードと54個の実績でやりこみ要素もばっちりです
定価でも後悔しないと思います

author: {'steamid': '76561198053643712', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1487366361}
review: Questo gioco da dipendenza! Quando cominci non riesci a smettere, vuoi continuare a giocare per migliorare il tuo punteggio. E' veloce, frenetico, in certi momenti c'è talmente tanta roba sullo schermo che non si capisce niente. Ci sono tante modalità di gioco, la rigiocabilita è praticamente infinita, la colonna sonora è azzeccata e graficamente è psichedelico, che si vuole di più??? Straconsigliato! Soprattutto per chi ama gli arcade!

author: {'steamid': '76561198201790263', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1512101068}
review:
WOW! This game was EPIC as it should!
I got this game when I saw it was on sale, so I quickly buy it to see what's inside.
I loved the graphics, but should be increasing the mouse sensitivity as the mouse sensitivity was a little low.
The gameplay? Simple, but beautiful!
In the game you should shoot AS much as you could because the virus (Usually the enemy, I used to call them "Virus")
always seeking to you, and that's the best part of the game. Eventually, the virus will grow up, spreading throughout the arena, then eventually, you could be killed by the virus. This game had so many game modes in it, but the only game mode I've played is Survival.

Oh! The music was awesome! I've been wondering where in the world I could get the music :v
Anyway, keep it up! Beautiful Game, Beautiful Graphics at such a reasonable price!

Note : I've made a review of this game, check it out in https://youtu.be/Z-GC1S8wf34 
Thank You!

author: {'steamid': '76561198067330795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1634753888}
review:
Great game for in between. 

In theory the game is very simple but after a few seconds it'll become very difficult 'cause one on one million isn't fair ;D . 
And if you want to max your points you have to use bombs and slomotion. No need to say, but you have to shoot everything around and avoid to collide with one of those little things. Well it's obvious that you need to do this at the same time.

The gfx looks awesome and the controlling works fine. Even the soundtrack is great. (Well you have to like the style of chiptune). 
You can play it with keyboard and mouse or with a gamepad. Both of them are easy to handle but I preffere the keyboard. 
Even the tutorial is really funny (Hint: you have to read it).

You will have much fun with this game for little money and it's definetly worth it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198212783799', 'num_games_owned': 503, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1472248956}
review:
Игра была куплена за 25 рублей.
Простенький шутер в очень приятном сеттинге. Саундтрек тоже не подвёл. 
   Купил из-за поддержки джойстика, прекрасно играется, когда на более серьёзные проекты сил уже нет. Ну или когда открываешь стим, будучи не очень трезвым))
   Из минусов только непропорционально резкое увеличение набора очков после появления разрастающихся "вирусов", уничтожение которых даёт несопоставимое ни с чем кол-во очков.

review: Игра просто потрясающая! Невероятно красивая и приятная графика, множество режимов игры, удобное управление, а также множество различных эффектов. Целью игры является уничтожение врагов при помощи комбо-ударов. В иге также присутствует замедление время, что может помочь Вам, если стало действительно жарко. Игра стоит своих денег!

author: {'steamid': '76561197961134832', 'num_games_owned': 483, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1444269671}
review: Pretty simple yet fun (depending on the game mode). Great visuals and a great soundtrack.

author: {'steamid': '76561198204284107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 700, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1558956981}
review:
游戏方式有点像《危险节奏》，不过不同的是Waves摆脱了音乐节奏的束缚，相对玩起来难度要高一些。
如果非要说明白，它也不过是一款平面射击游戏而已；但是，太吸引人了。只是获取高分，躲过敌人，但每一次擦肩而过生存下来的激动，是难以言表的。
游戏似乎是虚幻引擎？整体画面表现不错。球体在平面划过的水纹，爆炸的光影，整体都能给人一种漂亮爽快的感觉。
音乐也相当配合。个人并不是太喜欢电子乐，但Waves的BGM电子乐却让人感到非常舒服，和游戏本身相当契合。

非常适合闲暇时候放松娱乐的游戏，有兴趣的话值得一玩。

author: {'steamid': '76561198153733179', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1448737583}
review:
So far I haven't played much of this game, but when I play more or the game gets an update I will edit my review as I see fit.

Waves is a twinstick shooter with the main objective of getting the highest score possible by shooting enemies.

Graphics: The graphics of this game are absolutely beautiful. Even the smallest details in this game look amazing. 10/10

Gameplay: Personally I haven't found any problems with the gameplay, it's very smooth and fast paced. This game can be played with the sticks on a gamepad, or if you prefer you can play with a mouse and keyboard. 10/10

Soundtrack: The music in this game is very nice and fits the "environment". 9/10

Overall: I love this game and I think it is definetily worth $5 dollars. 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198058967818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1573148051}
review:
0,99€? ich hätt auch mehr dafür bezahlt! das game rockt!
nach anfänglichen einstiegsschwierigkeiten, da man sich, sofern man selten solche spiele spielt,
zunächst ein wenig eingewöhnen muss, ist es schwer dem flow den spiels zu entgehen, 
sobald man erstmal den dreh raus hat.
optisch 10/10, 
klang 7/10 (der soundtrack fängt recht fix an sich zu wiederholen),
steuerung 9/10 (sowohl maus&tastatur als auch controller werden sehr gut unterstützt, auch wenn der controller ein wenig ungenau beim zielen ist)
gesamt: 8,7/10 würd es wieder kaufen :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198055054505', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1439486340}
review:
Может показаться, что это типичная игра для убивание времени и расслабона - летаем и стреляем в кружочки. Но это не совсем так. Расслабляться здесь не когда - игра бросает вызов и призывает ставить всё новые и новые рекорды, а значит приходится попотеть. Тем более, что игра не слишком то и простая.

В игре много режимов, реиграбельность зашкаливает. А значит запуская каждый день на полчаса игра еще долго не надоест.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198061176934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1466006619}
review:
Купил за 30 рублей и ощутил себя вором.

+ необычайно сенсорно приятный геймплей
+ слоу-мо в такой игре - замечательное решение
+ юмор от разработчиков и прикольные достижения
+ семь (!) режимов игры
+ можно пропустить начальные заставки

- слабо было добавить какую-нибудь прокачку или сделать чуть больше разнообразия? Всего два вида оружия в twin stick-шутере (одно из которых выберается через настройки)?
- почему в последнем режиме у меня фпс падает до уровня "поставил ГТА5 на калькулятор"?
- я уже молчу про отсутствие кооператива.

review:
10/10  Would run from hugz again
This game is perhaps one of the most casual games in the casual section.
Passive-aggresive narator? hilarious!
help screen with an attitude? gut busting!
purple rollys aimlessly want hugz
orange rollys desperately want hugz
and then the green rollys have an existential crisis over the matter!

while the hour count doesn't seem high each game is a fast-paced, short lived run and gun from geometric cuddles

author: {'steamid': '76561198138045720', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1444467827}
review:
Я купил "Waves" на сдачу от покупки более крутых игр. И она неожиданно оказалась очень классной! 

Если вкратце, то вы – шарик с пушками и неким полем. К вам липнут другие шарики, но без пушек. В зависимости от цвета и формы (маленький/большой) они нападают с разной скоростью и в разных количествах. Ваша цель: [b] РАС***НАЧИТЬ ВСЁ  [/b] ! 

[list]
    [*] ПАТРОНЫ НЕ КОНЧАЮТСЯ
    [*] ПЕРЕЗАРЯДКА ДЛЯ СЛАБАКОВ
    [*] СЛОУМОУШН, ЕСЛИ ВЫ ОКРУЖЕНЫ И ЧУВСТВУЕТЕ ЭТОТ ПРОТИВНЕНЬКИЙ ЗАПАХ ПОЛНОЙ **ПЫ
    [*] КОГДА СКАПЛИВАЕТСЯ МНОГО НЕДВИГАЮЩИХСЯ ЦВЕТНЫХ ШАРИКОВ, ПОЯВЛЯЕТСЯ ВОЗМОЖНОСТЬ ВЗРЫВАТЬ, И ОДНИМ ВЗРЫВОМ ДЕЛАТЬ КОМБО x50+!
[/list]

Приятный футуристический интерфейс, механический женский голос (подсказывающий вам, неудачник вы или нет, лвлапнулись ли вы, готова ли бомба), замечательная не напрягающая музыка (можно выбрать эмбиент). В народе поговаривают, что это разновидность шутана; в "Waves" есть несколько режимов, которых хватит на любой вкус. На время, на выживание, раш, бомбодёрка (просто бегаете и взрываете, Взрываете, ВЗРЫВАЕТЕ), челлендж и ещё парочка непереводимых моим уровнем английского плюшек. 

Иногда "игры на сдачу" затягивают даже больше всех остальных.  
Определённо заслуживает внимания!

author: {'steamid': '76561198078612322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1435064776}

author: {'steamid': '76561198075673573', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 272, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1625888038}
review:
I rate the game Waves 3/5. Ok. 

This game has no bugs and interesting, cool, futuristic Tron Legacy styled graphics. Unfortunately too much of this game is style and far too little of this little game is substance. Remember the old 1980's arcade game Robotron? This is a less fun, less complex version of of that game with less interesting graphics. I'm happy I paid only 1.08 for this game instead of 5.00 as a result. The goal is to shoot stuff and earn points. A good game for a few minutes but extremely boring after 10 minutes. Ultimately Mediocre. Interesting sounds but they also quickly become repetitious.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178202685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 903, 'last_played': 1489067202}
review:
密閉されたフィールド内に延々と沸いて来る敵を撃ち続けるシューティング。
コンボが続けばボムで一掃。緊急回避にはスローモー。
説明するとそれだけのゲーム。

しかし単純ながらも爽快感が素晴らしい。
時間経過と共に敵の出現数が増えていくのだが、それらをショットで炙りボムで一掃。ボムでコンボが増えて更にボム・・・という流れが非常に気持ちが良い。
スローモーはよう分かりません。使おうと思ったときには死んでます。玄人向き？

ただし悪い点もちらほら。
足元沸きの事故死はある意味割り切るとしても、沸き途中の敵の色くらいは判別させて欲しい。
またシステム面ではないが曲数が少なすぎる。サンプル動画の曲はよいけど、その他はなんかいまいちだし。

とは言え不満に感じるのもゲームが面白いからこそ。
「ふざけんな！」と文句を言いつつやめられないゲームはいいゲームの証拠なのかと。

ふとした時にやりたくなる、長くHDDに残る一本。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066995167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1562417370}
review:
"Säubern Sie das Feld von Feinden mit Kombos, schnellen Angriffen und gut platzierten Bomben." so steht es auf der Shopseite von Waves, einem Arcade-shooter, der richtig Laune macht.
Man spielt einen kleinen schießenden Ball in einer runden Arena, in der immer wieder (je nach Game-Modi) neue Gegner spawnen.
Die Errungenschaften zu bekommen ist recht schwer, da nach einer leichten Einstiegshürde die Schwierigkeit hohe Highscores zu bekommen, die man für die Errungenschaften braucht, immer heftiger wird. (Balance nur 7/10, ist aber meckern auf hohem Niveau!)
 Die Musik im Spiel ist sehr gut gelungen und auch die SFX sind sehr gut, allerdings gibt es zu wenig Abwechslung im Soundboard (Bewertung von mir: 9/10 für den Sound).
Es gibt viele verschiedene Game-Modi, in denen man sein Können unter Beweis stellen kann.
Für 4,99€ ist es vielleicht etwas zu teuer, aber gerade im Sale sollte jeder zuschlagen, der auf mehr oder weniger entspannte Arcade-Action steht.
Klares plus von mir für dieses Spiel.
9/10 Gesamteindruck

author: {'steamid': '76561198206732036', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1434031763}

author: {'steamid': '76561198080045733', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 608, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1434833735}
review:
Pequeño pasatiempos que no incomoda en la biblioteca y al que se puede recurrir en cualquier momento para experimentar una intensa sesión de entretenimiento puro.

Como decía, es un juego intenso que requiere de bastante atención pero de temática simple.
Nos encontramos en un recinto cerrado y tendremos que ir esquivando al resto de objetos mientras los vamos eliminando.
Hay diferentes variaciones de la idea original para alagar la experiencia y complicarla. Por ejemplo, hay un modo en el que sólo podremos esquivar sin realizar disparos.

Lo bueno que tiene es que a pesar del caos que se puede llegar a experimentar con tantos enemigos y colorines, los controles responden muy bien a nuestras ordenes.

La música me tiene un poco descolocado. No es por el género utilizado: tecno inspirado en 8-bits y que se conjuga muy bien con la experiencia de juego, sino que en ocasiones la música deja de sonar y, para mi, en esos momentos el juego pierde intensidad.

Otra cosa que se podría mejorar sería la interfaz. Llega un momento en el que sólo ves objetos persiguiendote y pierdes toda información externa... como saber si dispones de bombas o cual es el nivel para poder ralentizar el tiempo.

Sin duda, un juego para conseguir a buen precio y dejarlo instalado para sesiones intermitentes.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198117921934', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1513504938}
review:
I bought waves expecting it to be a simple, boring time waster. Little did I know how wrong I was. Waves quickly becomes an intense battle for survival, with thick swarms of enemies chasing you constantly. I prefer Waves to Geometry Wars, as waves comes with a unique artstyle that I quickly grew to love. The different gamemodes are delightfully hard and enjoyable all round. 

9/10 would get my face eaten by a giant cube again

author: {'steamid': '76561198124610608', 'num_games_owned': 608, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1480605440}
review: What I like best about this game is that the laser weapon is not something to make the game easier but is something to give you a diiferent experience. The bullet gun uses spread fire to quickly & efficiently take out enemies but can sometimes miss. The laser is able to quickly move across enemies eliminating most in quick sucsession, however it sometimes can not penetrate the entire enemy or moves too fast across it. So you see each weapon has advantages & disadvantages. Not many top down shooters like this are that generous. Plus the graphics & gameplay are fanatastic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039351020', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 26, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1558820747}
review: A very fun and charming little game, I'm not sure it's worth a full 5$ because it is the type of game that will get rather repetitive, but with that said it does have some very nice options and really great music, if you love an asteroidish game with a techno theme and great music pick this one up on sale!

author: {'steamid': '76561198165246438', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 839, 'last_played': 1670850417}
review:
テクノなBGMの中で次々に湧いてくる敵を処理し続けるというシンプルな全方位シューティングです。
往年のシューティングテーム「サイヴァリア」に近い感覚の、コンボ継続中のみ発動できるボムでコンボを増やし、さらに次のボムの取得条件を満たしていく綱渡り感や、単純に演出によるプレイしていて気持ち良い感は素晴らしいです。
また単純なルールながらも難易度の上昇によって、敵を撃つ→ボムを交えて敵をなぎ倒していく→連続してボムを撃ち続けるために敵をリソースとして管理していく……とだんだんゲーム性が変わっていきます。最終盤になると常に敵でいっぱいのフィールドをボムで掻き分けてゆくといった感じの最初とは全く別のゲームになっていきます。

問題点としては自機に慣性が働くのに、自機近くに（自機に向かう方向で）敵が湧いてきて避けるのが非常に難しいケースが発生するというところか。(ただし、スローモーションシステムがそれを補ってはいる)
あと敵の動きの性質上、マウスで操作する標準マークをガシャガシャ動かした方が有利なことが多いのは無駄に腕が疲れるので、普段は拡散型を自動連射しといてショットボタン押しっぱなしで集中といいう首領蜂方式にして欲しかった。

author: {'steamid': '76561198058180344', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 214, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1459167642}
review:
Шикарная игра! Эта игра - именно то, чего так не хватало в моей библиотеке. Купив со скидкой за 25 р, я был шокирован этим увлекательным геймплеем, который никогда не давал заскучать. Со временем игры ачивки так и лились в мою копилку. 
Плюсы: 
- Увлекательный геймплей
- Прияткая графика и эффекты
Минусы:
- Отсутствие ко-оп.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042029841', 'num_games_owned': 503, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1432536471}
review:
Nota: 8/10

Estou impressionado com o jogo! Pensei que fosse um jogo casual daqueles tipos que você joga uma vez pra ver como é e desinstala, mas mudei de ideia!

A música é muito boa, a dificuldade só vai aumentando, fora que o jogo fica totalmente psicodélico! HAHA
O jogo consiste em rolar o seu player, que é uma bolinha muito louca e ficar destruindo os objetos que tentarão te matar. Destruindo todo que vê pela frente, você passa de level e vai só piorando as coisas! HAHA.

Eu me diverti muito, podem comprar de boa. Só não dou 10 porque acho que poderiam ter centenas de outras telas e desafios (inimigos, etc).

author: {'steamid': '76561198069543160', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 731, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 545, 'last_played': 1615713487}
review:
This isn't a game you play through and then put it away. This game isn't a game you play in 3 hour sessions.

Instead it is fun in 5-10 minute intervals.

And, oh my, fun it is. It is perfectly designed, not too easy, not too frustrating, easy to understand but with strategic depth. 

For example the bombs, you get bombs by building up a multiplier, but they destroy a big portion of the screen instantly, you can't sustain the multiplier if you there aren't any enemies you can destroy. And yet again you need the bombs to survive. You can also chain multiple bombs for a enormous multiplier, because the bomb can destroy enough enemies to give you a second bomb, but to get really the most of that you need to be careful about keeping certain enemies alive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087774607', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1592669472}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045370334', 'num_games_owned': 846, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 297, 'last_played': 1474697725}
review:
What the description says: In Waves, play as an anti-viral cell in a Neo-Cyberspace arena while your system is being overrun by bugs, errors and viruses and the only solution is to kill every rogue process before it kills you.

What the game feels like: In Waves, play as an MDMA molecule in a Digital Electronica club version of your brain while your mind is being overrun by feelings of sadness, confusion and reality and the only solution is to kill every inkling of the comedown before re-upping. 

+ Awesome twin-stick shooter
+ Bumping soundtrack
+ Intense graphics
+ Enemies exhibit a variety of maneuvers
+ Plenty of modes to choose from
+ Easy to play in short bursts
+ Challenge increases the more you play

- Multiplier system can be hard to climb
- Repetitive, but that's what the different modes are for
- Local or online co-op would be magical

Easily worth the price for the amount of gameplay available. 

8.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197986388748', 'num_games_owned': 309, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 645, 'last_played': 1607268644}
review:
Эта игра относится к особому разряду игр. Игр в которых задействован не головной, а спинной мозг. 
Враги здесь повсюду, я стреляю, замедляю время что бы протиснуться в образовавшийся проход, взрываю бомбу, подбираю левелап, ухожу по краю поля, обстреливаю вирус, взрываю бомбу и так далее, пока не умру. Я практически не вижу врагов в сполохах взрывов, но я чуствую их движение.
Я целюсь не рукой: тот, кто целится рукой, забыл лицо своего отца. Я целюсь глазом. 
Я стреляю не рукой: тот, кто стреляет рукой, забыл лицо своего отца. Я стреляю разумом. 
Я убиваю не оружием: тот, кто убивает оружием, забыл лицо своего отца. Я убиваю сердцем.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044406862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1655498485}
review:
I've played this game way more than a few times, and i'll try to be as serious as i can in this review.

Pros
- Colorful graphics.
- Simple to learn.
- Nice soundtrack, also available as DLC to purchase.
- Several different enemies, including static ones.
- Different game modes.

Cons
- Some users have issues with starting the game.
- Gameplay can be repetitive, even in the same run.

After all, i can say that the cons are nothing compared to the pros, and it's a really nice game to pass some time.
Totally worth it's cost, i rate it 9/10 if you like the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059530951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 268, 'playtime_forever': 560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1429682191}
review:
Waves est un petit jeu d'arcade très sympathique où le seul est unique objectif est de faire le plus gros score et ce, quel que soit le mode choisi parmi les sept proposés. Dans la même veine que son excellent aîné Geometry Wars, vous incarnez une boule qui doit survivre, au sein d'une arène délimitée, aux vagues d'assauts ennemis. Les ennemis étant, tout comme dans le jeu précédemment cité, des formes géométriques aux couleurs et aux comportements variables. Par exemple : les sphère rose se déplace lentement et aléatoirement ; les sphères rouges sont rapides et vont tout droit d'une extrémité à l'autre de l'arène ; les sphères jaunes vous suivent constamment, les vertes vous suivent mais fuient dès que vous allez dans leur direction etc. Tout l'intérêt du gameplay, qui se joue ici à la manette avec les deux joystick (l'un pour tirer l'autre pour se déplacer), est de survivre à ces vagues ininterrompus d'ennemis toujours plus nombreux pour ainsi faire le meilleur score. Il est important de toujours se déplacer, d'esquiver, de contourner et surtout, de ramasser l'expérience laissée par vos ennemis afin de monter en niveau. Lorsque vous passez un level, vous augmentez votre multiplicateur de point et de fait, votre score. La partie la plus subtile et la spécificité de Waves, c'est la capacité de votre boule à générer une bombe dès que vous atteignez un streak de dix ennemis tués. Cette bombe permet d'anéantir tous les ennemis autour de vous et se trouvant à une portée moyenne. Idéal de cultiver son streak pour se sortir des situations périlleuses ! Enfin, vous pouvez également, grâce à l'une des gâchettes du pad, ralentir le temps pendant un temps limité afin de vous frayer un chemin parmi ce joyeux bordel ambiant ! Génial !
Les graphismes sont simples mais efficaces, toutefois j'ai préféré l'univers visuel de Geometry Wars, plus prégnant, même si finalement les deux se ressemblent beaucoup. En revanche, l'ambiance sonore est nulle à chier ! Quel gâchis ! La plupart du temps, les musiques sont discrètes voire inexistantes ! Et les quelques musiques electro un peu pêchues sont très décevantes. Gros point noir pour Waves. Une musique entraînante est indispensable dans les jeux arcade de ce type. On regrettera aussi le fait qu'il n'y ait qu'un seul mode d'arme, contrairement à son aîné qui en proposait plusieurs. Mais dans l'ensemble Waves parvient à l'essentiel : se rendre addictif et fun !

author: {'steamid': '76561198141957545', 'num_games_owned': 851, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1661602165}
review:
Pros:
Pretty damn fun.
Feels difficult, but generally without feeling unfair.
Looks cool.
Controller support is great, best way to play.

Cons:
No rebinding. I'd like to bind the bomb and slomo buttons to the buttons instead of the triggers, but I can't.
A few of the game modes feel a little unnecessary.
Should probably have some kind of gun upgrades or something, it'd spice the game up and give it a lot more replay value, without it, this game gets old a lot faster than other similar games.
Pausing is really funky. You can't pause while you're respawning, a process that takes like 5 seconds, an annoyingly long time if you've gotten a bad start to survival mode or something and just wanna restart. And to further the frustration, the menu takes a little too long to come up, and if you're trying to pause in a hurry and aren't sure it came up, you may accidentally unpause it by hitting it again. In a fast-paced game like this, pauses NEED to be instantaneous, nothing feels worse than dying because you were trying to pause.

But, it's $5, which ain't too bad, so unless any of those things are a dealbreaker, I still recommend it. Good few hours of fun to be had here. If they add more weapons/guns/bullets or whatever, and maybe some gamemodes that aren't just bouncing around a circle, like an actual map, then it's a must have.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964864960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1429858014}
review:
First thing you'll notice with this game is the need to turn off all bloom, effects, and everything, so you can see what the heck is going on. Second thing will be the terrible controls. Third thing will be how utterly random everything seems to be (what enemies spawn when, where, and everything in between).

Add to that how the game will berate, or downright insult you when it thinks you're not using the stupid "slowmo" that gets you killed more often than it saves you (because making things slower won't change the bad controls or how much inertia they decided the game needed) often enough, and quite frankly, I really can't recommend this exercise in frustration.

I'm sure I could get better with more practice. I'm also sure it wouldn't be particularly fun to do so.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027304457', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1431024141}
review: Waves is a modern take on the classic space shooter arcade games of the 80's. In Waves you'll find that the controls are very easy to pick up and that the gameplay has a nice casual feel to it. The graphics and colors in Waves give it a fun and attractive look/feel. With each level of Waves comes more challenging enemies charging at you, more bright explosions, and more intensity to the gameplay; all the while maintaining a simple core concept of flying around shooting enemies in outter space. A few other nice things about Waves are: a fun sountrack, bits of humor hidden in the game, a handful of different game modes, and loads of steam achievements. I'd highly recommend this game to fans of twin-stick shooters or to those looking for a fun game that can easily be picked up for a few minutes at a time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091388279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 146, 'last_played': 1584292442}
review:
God help you. God help you all. That drug addiction you kicked? A nervous tic. If your friends describe you as the poster child for addictive personalities, then just click away and save yourself the glorious, swarming, bullet-hell-esque heart ache.

I won't keep hitting you with vague hyperboles, but you need to check this out while getting it is easy. The value you're getting out of this game for $0.99 is stupid. It's simple, but visually it's surprisingly attractive, and there are several game modes to suit your play style. Perhaps the most accurate way I can paint an image for you is by drawing a parallel with Super Meatboy. It's lacks any sort of story depth that Super Meatboy may have, but it has that same lightning-fast, razor's edge pace that demands every ounce of attention you can possibly wring from your brain. That exhilerating feeling of only barely being able to keep up, and the highly rewarding feeling of pulling of a sick run.

Minimal, highly arcade, highly retro with cutting-edge PhysX graphics. Get this while it's on sale. Seriously. There is not another game on Steam as of this date that is a better buy for $0.99. If you're reading this later, I feel like it may well be worth the regular $5.00 price tag.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064530048', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 303, 'last_played': 1480779504}
review:
I brought the game because it was cheap on a sale (79p), but it's actually a really good game!

It's an arcade style twin stick shooter. I really like the neon-looking style to fit with the theme of Cyberspace and errors & viruses overrunning the arena. The main objective in most modes is to last as long as you can and shoot your way through the waves of enemies, with each wave getting progressively harder. There are different coloured bugs which overrun the arena, each with a different movement pattern and there is also a virus of hexagons which grows over time filling the arena. These viruses are good for shooting to obtain a "bomb" which you can use by hitting the space bar, but if you wait too long it will wear off and you won't be able to use it.

I love the "Bombing Run" mode, where you can't shoot at all but you have to roll and dodge enemies while going from red hexagons to green hexagons to set off a bomb, killing enemies near you. The dodging enemies can require some good skills but you also get a shield every so often to help protect you, the shield basically pushes enemies back if they hit you for a short amount of time acting like a instant second life.

Also - Achievements! ^_^

author: {'steamid': '76561198077246586', 'num_games_owned': 454, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1453036127}
review: OK, here is the test for whether you should get this game. Go play some free twin-stick shooter, like Echoes. Did you like it? Then you're going to fucking love this game. The controls are awesome and tight. The enemies are all interesting and unique. But the coolest part is the mechanics. The 4 moves are: Move, shoot, bomb, and slow down time. The first two are self explanitary, after a ten hit combo you have a second to activate a bomb, and you slowly charge a buffer, that can slow down time and get you double points while you do so 'because it looks awesome'. Oh, and you also get double points for shooting enemies at point blank 'because it looks awesome'. This game is awesome.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027493902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1426151082}
review:
Bof. Le jeu est ultra répétitif, proposant plus de modes de jeux (qui sont très classiques: time attack, survie, challenge...) que de pistes musicales. 
Le menu du jeu rame sur mon PC (qui fait tourner n'importe quel jeu avec les paramètres graphiques au max). 
L'univers du jeu essaie de vous draguer en utilisant une voix robotique à la portal et plein d'effets visuels de flou ou de distorsion surchargés. C'est uniquement pour cacher l'unique arène de jeu (un bête cercle minusculaire) et le faible nombre d'ennemis (des boules de plusieurs couleurs, des cubes faisant office de boss et des hexagones qui s'étendent lentement pour former une espèce de mousse). 
On contrôle une boule qui tirer des lasers, fait éclater des bomes et peut activer des ralentis. Il n'y a pas de possibilité d'amélioration.
Le plus gros problème là-dedans c'est qu'on s'ennuie très vite, et que la rejouabilité est quasi-nulle, ce qui est un gros défaut pour ce type de jeu.

Beat Harzard est bien plus intéressant à ce niveau, et aussi bien plus fun. Il n'en fait pas des tonnes pour essayer de nous impressionner. 
Waves propose en réalité une expérience de jeu réduite à sa plus simple expression.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067952614', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1651565426}
review:
[h1] Waves Review - Ace Elite [/h1]

Waves is a fantastice arcade twin-stick shooter, perfect for wasting that 10 minuetes you don't know what do do with you life on. Or 30 mins. Or 2 hours, Like me.

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

Waves controls extremely well, with a controller or not. You play as a ball, and your aim is pretty much to blow up everything in the arena to earn XP, to earn multipliers, to earn points. This ball that you play as has a couple of tricks up it's sleeve though, the first is the ability to slow down time, and the second is, after you reach a combo of 10, you can let off this  explosion killing everything within a small area. The scoreboard in this game is amazing, it clearly and neatly displays your friends high scores as well as your own when you end the game. It even displays  your friends high scores during the game to the right of the screen. This suprisingly doesn't interrupt gameplay at all. The game has several modes, Including: Crunch Time, Survival, Rush, Bombing Run, Challenge, Chase and Hold. Survival, which I would say is the main mode here, as it is just classic roll around and kill everything, you have 3 lives and unlimited time to post the best score and every 10 levels, you gain an extra life, in Rush, you have 2 minutes to earn points, and every time you die you lose 10 seconds from your time, Crunch Time throws you into the arena with infinite lives and 3 minutes to just have fun, and that is what you do in this mode, have fun, in Hold mode, you have 3 lives and have to to stay within a circle of light as it floats around the arena,you have to stay inside this as your guns won't work outside of it, Chase is an insane mode where you have 5 seconds to roll over to these red pads, which re-news your five seconds to live, Challenge mode gives you 20 waves of enemies, and 30 seconds to complete each one. Completeing the challenges, (doing it within an amount of time and stuff like that) will award you bonus points, finally there is Bombing Run, which  dissables your guns, and throws down these red pads, you then need to roll over them to pick up the bomb and then go to the green pad before the bomb explodes, when you get the bomb on the green pad, it explodes killing everything. Except you. 

[h1] Prettyness (or graphics/presentation) [/h1]

Waves has an awesome art style, everything is very crisp and works well together with the amazing neon glow of everything. Sometimes the screen can get a bit crowded, but this isn't too bad.

[h1] Sounds/Music [/h1]

Waves has an amazing sound track wich fits in perfectly in the background of all this caos. there is also a nice robotic lady-like voice that tells you when your bomb is ready and stuff like that.

[h1] Verdict [/h1]

This is a fantastic game for just 5 bucks considering the amount of content. I highly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys, um, explosions, guns, balls, cool music and robot voices :).

Thanks for reading this!

TL;DR
Has explosions and guns.
Nuff said.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144206737', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1610920535}
review: Waves ist ein Arcade-Spiel mit einigen verschiedenen Modi, die jeweils gut entwickelt worden sind und Spaß machen. Z.B. kann man in einem "Bomben" Modus nicht schießen, sondern muss sich von Bombenfeld zu Bombenfeld bewegen, um Bomben, die die Gegner zerstören, zu aktivieren, während man im Survival Modus die Gegner erschießen muss. Jedoch geht es im gesamten Spiel darum, sich von den Kugel-,Würfel- und Feldförmigen Gegnern sich nicht zu berühren lassen, um gegebene Leben oder Zeit zu behalten, und diese für Punkte zu zerstören, wobei die Slow-Motion-Funktion in jedem Modus benutzbar ist. Der Preis von 4,99€ ist nicht zu hoch gesetzt, wenn man solche "Spielautomaten-Spiele" mag. Wenn man aber nur ein Gelegenheitsspiel sucht, sollte man auf einen Sale warten.

review: This game reminds me of an old Mac game, the title of which escapes me right now, but maybe Dr. Z? Either way, you operated as a lone survivor in a room and had to kill off wave after wave of zombies. it was simple, but addicting. Waves takes that theme to another level by adding a variety of enemy types and what I assume is predictive 'boss' group spawns depending on how much you move around. It will also destroy your WASD keys and give you multiple heart conditions. 10/10 would recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068802071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1423341790}
review:
This game is only good if you can buy it for less than the price of geometry wars: retro evolved. GW:RE outclasses it in so many different ways: better bomb system, better combo system, and better enemies; but, the problems that this game has can be easily fixed with one or two balance patches, but the devs seem to want to use their time putting in community reccomendations for game modes and shit instead of fixing these. 

Some specific gripes:

Bombs are terrible. They are never usefull when you can get them, unless you can kill a bunch of virus in a small period of time, because the enemies that you killed to get the combo to get the bomb were probably all the enemies in the bomb's radius. 

Enemies are unbalanced. The clustery things that turn red when you shoot them are a direct upgrade from the 3 little ball things, but they sacrifice speed for survivability: this means that it takes so much more effort to kill them than it does to kill literally any other enemy other than cubes. The green ball things that dodge your bullets are absolute bullshit; you could be in a perfectly fine position, then 4 or 5 of these fuckers spawn in, and suddenly you have to use all of your slowmo to kill each of them individually, and if you miss, you have to resort to killing them outside of slowmo, which poses the same problem as the clustery things- you're using more and more effort to kill something that shouldn't take that much. 

Enemies use too much rng to spawn. Enemies in this game spawn in seemingly completely random patterns, and take .5-1 seconds to spawn; this means that if you're being overwhelmed in a game and one or two dudes spawn right next to you, you either have to use your slowmo to move out of there, or you instantly die, and you've probably already used your slowmo to survive being overwhelmed. 

Cubes have too much health for their size and impact on the game. The cubes in this seem good on paper, but when implemented, are absolutely fucking broke as shit in practice. They have the same problem as those other ones I put down, with taking too much effort to kill, exept these ones seriously punish you for not having the answer to them right when they come into play; they need to spawn in when you're in a position to get a bomb fast, otherwise you have this huge death-square coming for you and you can't deal with it without leaving every other enemy unattended. 

The combo system is trying too hard to be original. Honestly this part could be very easily fixed if the devs understood why most games use either the 'combo is constantly going up as you kill enemies and resets when you die or something' system or the 'combo goes up pretty fast but instantly goes away in a small period of time after you don't kill something' system. The system that waves uses is trying to make the latter better, but fails miserably: you need to kill 3 enemies to get one stack, and that will only happen when you're being overwhelmed by enemies or during an ambush of like 10 dudes. It rewards you for being in situations any sane person shouldn't be putting themselves in, which results in you needing to be lucky/really really good at twin stick shooters to get high scores in survival. 

The challange mode is absolutely infuriating for completionists. Not being able to go in and pick which levels you want to do and not do is just fucking terrible. Having to do that one level that you always fuck up on when you're doing great in one challange run makes me want to stop playing this. 

TL;DR: This game is poorly designed and needs balance changes and you shouldn't buy it until the devs fix what I've complained about. 3/10 outclassed by geometry wars in almost every way.

Edit: the music is pretty ehh as well, thought I should mention it; easily fixed by turning it off and turning on your own music.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168724516', 'num_games_owned': 926, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 407, 'last_played': 1434921364}
review:
※ まず初めに、面白いことは間違いないですし数々の肯定意見は正しいと思います。
　ただ個人的におすすめしますか？と聞かれたら「おすすめはできない」と答える為に「No」を押しました。

【日本語】
　公式対応なし　日本語ＭＯＤ見当たらず
　
　とくに必要ないと思います

【概要】
　全方位に撃てる箱庭２Ｄシューティングとも言うべきでしょうか。
　非現実的な原色のグラフィックやポップなＢＧＭ（癒し系ではないです）で、円状の閉鎖空間で操作キャラ（球体）を操作、ボムとスローモーションを駆使し延々と襲ってくる敵性オブジェクトを破壊し続けるシンプルなシューティングです。
　
　操作キャラは球体なんですが、慣性の法則（でいいのかな？）が働き、急には止まれませんし、カクっカクっと鋭角な折れ線の上を渡るような挙動はできません。
　メーター残量さえあれば何時でも使える瞬間的なスローモーション（敵味方共に遅くなる）一定数コンボ達成時に短時間のみ使用選択ができるボムを上手く使うと大量スコア獲得のチャンスがあります。　

　また一部のモード以外は終わりが無いので、やられるまで続きます。言ってみれば、グラフィックやＢＧＭを楽しめればいいという人以外には、どのゲームモードも純粋なスコアアタックオンリーのエンドコンテンツとなっています。
　ゲームモードについては某笑顔の動画サイトにルール説明動画が投稿されているので参考までにどうぞ。
　

【感想】
　かなりストレスがたまりました。
　
　見た目はカジュアルですが、ゲーム自体は全くカジュアルではないです。カジュアルというタグを期待して買った人の場合、おそらく「爽快感」よりも「いらだち」が先行します。
「完全な理不尽ではないですよね？」というシステムのせいで、文句すら言えません。だから自分のようなガチでないプレイヤーがやるとストレスがたまります。

　ＦＰＳをやったこと無い人が初代の「Serious Sam（シリアス・サム）」をノーセーブでやる感じです。
　
　以下、不満点を書きなぐっていきます。
　敵オブジェクトの動きは色別に一定の特性がありある程度予測が付くのですが、沸き地点についてはランダムで覚えゲーではありません。なのに時間経過と共に、移動中目の前に急に沸きます。一応敵オブジェクトの沸き地点について、その殆どが１秒未満ですが地面が光り事前にわかります。ただ集合ブロック型の敵オブジェクトについて何の前兆もなく沸きます。ぶつかれば勿論１ミスです。かといって足元に沸くことは絶対に無いので、そのとき移動さえしていなければ１００％対処不可能な状況はありません。基本移動しながらのゲームですが。
　で、問題はそういった理不尽さを引き立たせるのが操作キャラの慣性の法則と、上級者であってもそれらを対処する方法が限定的で局地的なボムやスローモーションギミックありきのゲームバランスになっていることです。
　まず、その綺麗な原色の敵キャラと様々なエフェクトが相まって、瞬間的に敵が視認困難になる。ただでさえ色以外での識別が難しいのにフィールドの景色の色が頻繁にかわり、敵オブジェクトと色が一瞬被るとわけがわからなくなる。画面に映るのはマップの半分くらいで、自機移動中に画面外から未視認の敵オブジェクト（特に赤）が最大速度で突っ込んでくると並大抵の反射神経では回避できません。
　ゲームモードによっては光る小さな円形の中でのみ射撃が可能なんですが、その円形フィールドが眩しく見えて、撃破エフェクトも相まって敵が判別しにくい。特に経験値エフェクト、黄色くて小さい３つの敵オブジェクト、ボム後の破壊エフェクト、これらがフィールドの色と被った場合、自機周辺が全く分からなくなります。
　ボム後は周りの敵が全て破壊されるのですが、これが高スコアを狙うようになるとボム直後の自機移動が必須になります。ボムの範囲は広いのですが、自機の移動速度も遅くなく、ボムのエフェクトも派手+敵機破壊エフェクトの余韻がやたら長いので、ボム使用後にエフェクトに隠れて見えないポップした敵に突っ込んでしまうことが少なからずあります。勿論そこからすぐ動かなければいいんですが、本来そんなゲームなんでしょうか。しかもコンボ判定がかなり厳しく、高スコアを目指す場合移動は必須になっています。
　つまり高スコアを目指すプレイヤーに対して、本来開発者が想定していた理不尽さとは違った理不尽さが存在するように思えるんですね。

　その理不尽さの対処、回避としてボムとスローがあります。が、ランダム沸きと硬い敵オブジェクトの存在も合わさり、ボムとスロー以外では回避できない状況があります。つまり通常操作ではなくボムとスローありきのゲームバランスになっていえると感じてしまうわけです。
　で、このボムとスロー両方とも使用にスコアが絡みやすいのが曲者。ボムはコンボによるスコア倍率がありそれはまだいいんです。これスロー中はスコアが２倍になるというシステムになってるんですよ。高スコアが欲しいときはスローにする必要性がなくてもスローにするよう誘惑してくるわけです。
　つまり「いかにボムコンボのための移動とスローを使ってスコアを稼ぐか」と同時に、
　　　　「いかにボムとスローによるスコアを我慢して生き残るか」を常に頭におく必要が出てきます。回避だけにこの２つがいつでも使えるなら納得のしようもありました。

　自分の操作を見直そうと思っても、理由が「反射神経が足りなった」と今更どうしようもない理由しか出てこない。
　だから「反射神経さえあればスコアは伸びます」と言われたら、それはカジュアルではないでしょう？という結論に至ったわけです。

　じゃあスコアに拘らなければいいと言うのが普段の自分なんですが、このゲームに関してはそうとも言えません。
　実績解除の設定も高め、１つしかないマップと代わり映えの無い敵オブジェクト、縛りがメインになりすぎている各ゲームモード。
　上記の内容を並べてみると、もはやグラフィックを楽しむ人以外はゲームとしてはスコアアタックをやってくれと製作者が言ってるように聞こえてしまいます。

　こうだったらよかったと個人的に感じる点

　・コンボ判定の猶予延長やボムやスローの仕様を調整
　・敵機オブジェクトのポップを調整　
　・開放的なゲームモードの追加（カジュアルで気軽に楽しめるモード）
　・スコア等ゲームスキルに関係のないユニークな実績の追加

review: I quickly grew to like this game and the subtle variations in play modes.  The scoring is well done and visually its appealing.  The ample number of achievements have been satisfying to complete.  The interface allows for easy navigation and there are plenty of options.  One minor omission is the inclusion of auto-fire, especially since there is no restriction on the amount of ammunition shot.  I have no major complaints with the game itself however it does leave me with cramps from the rapid mouse movements needed to spray the hordes of nasties. 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198005615933', 'num_games_owned': 612, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1481542391}
review: 打发时间不错，音乐很燃，菜单下鼠标有一种阻滞感（也许是我的电脑渣）。活用鼠标右键的子弹时间对于许多状况有奇效，空格的炸弹只能在combo状态下使用有点不太习惯= =combo是取得高分的唯一方式（还要算上升级捡到的加倍）不要死掉，也不要断连就能拿到高分。

author: {'steamid': '76561198025332498', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1475847229}
review:
Waves is a twin stick shooter that cost be 99 cents, and it was worth so much more. A simply and very well designed game Waves has you moving and shooting in all directions to destroy brightly coloured balls and shapes. There are a variety of game modes which are all fun and engaging, my personal favourite being Challenge, Survival and Bomb Run. This game is very hard in stages but it’s never frustrating, if you die it’s your fault, not hardware, making you even more determined to beat your last high score, or the scores of your friends. Not to mention the dry wit and humor in the instructions and end game screens is hilarious and well worth a few dollars. If you can get a few friends to play against even more so. 

The visuals, music and gameplay are spot on and it's a great little time sink that I highly reccomend. 

A word of warning however, this game is MUCH easier and fun with a controler, rather than a keyboard.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119001128', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1424779642}
review:
Boş zamanlarınızda sıkılmadan oynayabileceğiniz eğlenceli ve bir o kadar görsel zenginliği bulunan harika bir oyun waves.Comboları ne kadar çok ve seri halde yaparsak bir o derece fazla puan alınmaktadır.Oyunun amacıda zaten bol bol puan kazanmak.Slow Motion özelliğini kullanarak (fare sağ tuş) sıkıştığınız anda düşmanlardan kaçmanıza "aralarından sıyrılmanıza" önemli ölçüde katkıda bulunan bir özellik.
Oyunun içeriği şu şekilde; 
Crunch Time; Zamana karşı mücadele ettiğimiz time cube vurarak zaman kazandığımız bölüm.
Survival: Hayatta kalma modunda ise; 3 can veriliyor ve zorluk derecesi level up oldukça artmakta.
Rush: Verilen can sonsuz fakat sonu olan bir süreye karşı saldırı dalgaları dalgaları karşısında dayanmalı ve süremizi arttırmak için aralarda çıkan time cube (+20sn) kırmak gerekiyor.
Bombing Run: En sevdiği ve çılgın oyun modu.Zaman ve atomik bombaları toplayarak etraftaki saldırıları püskürtme yapıyoruz.
Challenge: Mücadele modu ise 20 farklı türevde saldırı ve farklı düşmanları içermekte.
Hold: Yuvarlak bir kurenin içinde alarak düşmanlar ile mücadele etttiğimiz zorlayıcı bir mod.
Chase: Oyunun belkide en kıl modlarından biri.Süreleri toplayarak (+5sn) bir yandan da saldırıları yok ederek veya kaçarak oynadığımız ve bol bol puan topladığımız modlardan biri.
Grafikler ve ses genele bakılırsa gayet iyi.Oyun içindeki efekt sesleri ve diğer oyun içi sesler buna müzikte dahil tatminkar seviyede.Genel olarak 10 / 8 başarılı bir yapım olduğunuz ve birçok yaş grubuna hitap edebilen oyundur.
Keyifli oyunlar! TRLogic :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198021137936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1558926466}
review:
멋진 파티클 이펙트와 Super Hexagon만큼의 흥한 BGM과 함께하는 탄막 슈팅 게임입니다.
원 안에서 자신의 공을 굴려가며 적들의 공과 육각형들을 신나게 쏴부수면 됩니다.
이펙트가 너무 화려해서 뭐가 뭔지 구분이 잘 안 갈 수도 있지만 하다보면 금방 익숙해질 겁니다.
하이 스코어를 위해서는 테크닉을 갈고 닦는 많은 노력을 기울여야 하며, 게임 모드도 다양하기 때문에 하나하나 모두 정복해보는 것도 좋겠네요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016635124', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1421805594}
review:
If you're a fan of dual stick shooters already, waves is a very solid one. The gimmick here is that you can slow down time when you've charged up your meter enough, and this simple but satisfying mechanic really is enough to make it stand out. The avatar also has a bit of momentum to it, making it feel a bit different to control than other shooters.

Honestly, there isn't much to say. You probably already know if you like this style of game. It's fast-paced arcade action with replay value for as long as you can entertain yourself beating your own high scores. If you're looking for an exciting, flashy game to keep you entertained for a week or two, Waves is a pretty fantastic deal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025669540', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 5614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4241, 'last_played': 1669508255}
review:
Ich zock es jetzt schon seit nem Jahr  und kann immer noch nicht aufhören. Man verbessert seine Skills kontinuierlich und trotz der Scorebegrenzung (die man erstmal erreichen muss...) ist die langzeitmotivation aufgrund des Arcadecharacters garantiert. Und ich hab die anderen Modi ausser Survival noch nicht mal angerührt :D

Die Grafik ist das reinste Feuerwerk und das Gameplay ist instant und immer wieder fordernd. Alle Daumen hoch.
Besonders fies: Die kleine Kugel, die man lenkt hat ne leichte trägheit, was manchmal echt frustrierend sein kann, denn in dem Spiel kommt es oft auf jeden Pixel an.

review:
This game has all the right junk in all the right places.

But seriously, its a highly polished little shooter with great gameplay and suprising satisfaction.

I also own Beat Hazard, AudioSurf 2 and Geometry Wars 3 - and I would have to say that Waves is my favourite in the genre.

The only thing I find a bit lacking is the no MP.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998716508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1420639493}
review:
Twin joystick shooters tend not to be for me, but I find myself enjoying this game a lot. The game feel is dead on and there's some real momentum to contend with. The player's weapon never changes (I think) and the survival mode is all I want it to be really.

I don't find myself getting into the other modes of play, but they're there if you want them. I'll probably update this review as I play the game more, but if you want something with good game feel and a good few songs then this is a pretty solid $5.00 to spend. I'd wait for it to be on sale or a bundle though. There are other games like this with more content out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978705200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 250, 'playtime_forever': 206, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1417467634}
review:
This game is essentially Geometric Battles 2. If you're looking for a quality twin-stick shooter, and you're sick of having so much free-time, then give this a look.

PLOT: Roll around, shoot stuff, and don't die.
While there are seven modes of play, there are some constants to be aware of. Waves emphasizes the multiplier-system. Every-time you level-up, a multiplier bonus appears on the field. Scores tend to be very top-heavy, the longer you survive, the better your score. However, by playing risky and using the limited slowmo ability, you can tack on another 4X bonus to every shape you destroy. Early on that doesn't mean much, but earning a 60X bonus by level 15 can be very nice. It also pays to keep combos going, because for every 10 shapes, you get a temporary bomb. For most modes, an extra-life is awarded every 10 levels.

Crunch Time - You have three minutes to get a high-score. Since time is limited, this mode revolves around maximising the slow-down ability. This is a good mode, especially when you want to play a videogame, but only have a few minutes.

Survival - Self-explanatory. You're given a stock of lives and you have to go as long as possible. Every several seconds a wave of enemies surrounds you, which can mix things up a bit.

Rush - You're under a time-limit, with extra seconds only awarded through level-ups and destroying cubes. My strategy consists of moving in circles, only going for the multipliers if I bomb through the hordes. Honestly, I think I play it a little too safe, and my score tends to suffer as a result.

Bombing Run - No weapons and you have to keep grabbing and exploding bombs to destroy enemies and survive. Your only other means of defense is a shield. It recharges quickly when the action is hectic, but only activates once. I really enjoy this mode, because is focuses on almost entirely on proper maneuvering. 

Challenge - Destroy enemies as quickly as possible, get a high multiplier, achieve ratings of up to five stars. This mode consists of 20 stages. It's alright, if you're looking for something a bit more concise. The challenges have specific tactics so you're employing more thought into the game aside from: "I better not run into this shape!"

Chase - You have about five seconds to move from point to point while destroying shapes. I guess this mode is directed at guys like me who prefer to play the wall and take it easy. Due to the ultra-stringent time-limit, things will get extremely intense. It's easy to fall into despair, when you have only a second left, and a thick crowd of enemies have blocked off the next point.

Hold - You can only fire while in the lit-area. Keep in mind that this is a tight-space to be confined to. You might even have to leave the lit-area just to lure shapes out of your personal space. Those precious multiplier bonuses tend to spawn outside as well. This is a tough mode to play, simply due to how claustrophobic it is. I don't really care for it.

While getting overwhelmed in this game is a constant, what actually kills you is usually the one shape that gets away. You're circling around, firing at a huge mass of shapes, but you're not looking at where you're moving to. Guess what happens next? An enemy spawns in your face and you die. Maybe that one shape matrix-dodges your bullets somehow. Yes the game can throw so many shapes on-screen that it'll cause your $1000 PC to freak out, but what kills you? That one shape. I shouldn't have to say this, but focus is the key. If you're distracted for 1/120000th of a second, you're done for.

Like its inspiration, Waves has really good leaderboard support. If you have a lot of friends that play this game, all the better. The score of the next person ahead of you is always on display, giving you an incentive to work harder. 

There's not much else to say really, you probably already own this game(via an indie bundle), but ignored it due its generic title. Definitely give this game a look, you'll likely have a lot of trouble putting it down though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991625636', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 371, 'last_played': 1541399203}

author: {'steamid': '76561198011289000', 'num_games_owned': 149, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 972, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 468, 'last_played': 1626803337}
review:
A decent and rather unique twin stick game.

It's bomb dynamic is an innovative twist on an old format, learning to chain them in combination with your slow-mo ability is the key to success and it's both original and refreshing!

Visually it's OK and I like the short written verdict on your performance after each game.

I do find that the inertia based player movement is overly sluggish when changing direction, it works in slow-mo but is a frequent cause of death at normal speed even though you can clearly see in advance what you would like to dodge.

Challenge mode could do with re-balancing as some stages are far more difficult than others with no information regarding what's needed to achieve a better rating. 

Overall it's worthy of a place in any twin stick fans collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133198333', 'num_games_owned': 1978, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1425116869}
review:
«Все гениальное просто» - это выражение в полной мене подходит для этой игры. Возможно (и скорей всего так и есть) я не прав сказав, что данная игра - минимализм во всем, на который сверху намазали жирный слой спецэффектов из разряда «рай эпилептика». Однако, минимум сложных форм, минимум текстур, минимум кнопок управления (два стика и две кнопки) и музыка из которой так же выкинули все лишнее... м-м-минимализм же, нет?
Вообще музыка это отдельный разговор, во время игрового процесса любители 8-и битных мелодий и прочего чиптюна будут довольны. Это не та игра в которой 90% людей через 10 минут выкручивают ползунок громкости музыки на 0.  Хотя, конечно трушным любителям чиптюна угодить сложно, но скорей всего звуковое и музыкальное сопровождение их порадует.
Покупйте, играйте и не забывайте использовать бомбы!

author: {'steamid': '76561197982225800', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 318, 'playtime_forever': 339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1379646708}
review:
I wrote my opinion on this game in a forum post well-before reviews were added to Steam, so I'll just copy-and-paste it here:


Well, Waves is a dual-stick shooter that is aesthetically similar to Geometry Wars 2, but that's about it.

I'll sum-up what I think the main differences are:

[list]
[*]The ship in Waves has weight to it (unlike GW 1 & 2), so you can't just turn on a dime.
[*]You can slow-down time (which also grants you a point-bonus per enemy you kill while in slow-mo). This ability recharges at a decent pace.
[*]You have bombs, but they works rather differently: When you get a combo of 10 kills, you can use a bomb (you lose it if you lose your combo, though). As you can imagine, there can be a lot of enemies on screen, so getting a 10x combo is mind-numbingly easy to do again and again.
[*]There is a Level & Experience system, which is used to scale-up the difficulty for a particular play-session. I find it adds absolutely nothing to the game, and there's no reason to even pay attention to it as you're playing.
[/list]

That said, you can basically play it with your brain off by just going around in circles, and spamming bombs over and over again because of how quick/easy it is to constantly get 10x combos. And not long into a session, there'll be enough enemies to constantly net you those 10x combos that it won't even matter what direction you shoot in anymore.

At least, that was my experience playing it the other day, which was the first time in just under one year. I only played the main mode during that session (Survival mode), and on my very first try, got the achievement for attaining the highest score possible. So all Waves left me with was a main game mode that was way too easy to top-out, and a few other game-modes which I distinctly remember not liking very much.

So yeah, I feel that those looking for a Geometry Wars fix will find Waves somewhat disappointing. It's not a bad game at all, and might even be a decent distraction if you could get it really cheap, but it left me feeling really underwhelmed - both a year ago, and when I picked it up again the other day.

[b]Edit:[/b] I made a silly.

review: Превосходная убийца времени. Одна арена, одна и та же раскладка управления, почти десяток режимов и сотни объектов, запрограммированных на то, чтобы обломать всё веселье. Замедление времени и бомба, активируемая при достаточно длинной серии комбо прилагаются. Не сказать, что в эту игру вы будете играть каждый день, но когда вы будете в ней особо остро нуждаться - вас уже ничто не остановит от ураганного геймплея с потрясной музыкой от SMILETRON.

review: Sehr gutes Gelegenheitsspiel! Es macht für den Augenblick viel Spaß, allerdings wird es im Normalfall nach spätstens einer halben Stunde langweilig. Daher nichts für Leute, die ein Langzeitabenteuer suchen. Ich empfehle es jedem Strategen und allen, die immer nur kurz Zeit zum Computerspielen haben. 5€ sind zwar etwas viel, dennoch war es kein Fehlkauf und ich finde es jetzt gut, dieses Spiel gekauft zu haben. Ich hoffe, dass euch meine Bewertung geholfen hat und wünsche weiterhin viel Spaß beim Zocken (auch, wenn ihr euch Waves jetzt nicht kauft)!

author: {'steamid': '76561197998118312', 'num_games_owned': 2100, 'num_reviews': 388, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1415243664}
review:
Rating 9/10
Overview: Twin Stick Arena Shooter

The Good:

+The game has an interesting premise. Killing enemies levels you up. Upon leveling, a score multiplier is randomly placed in the arena. Collecting this increases your multiplier by 1 permanently. Killing lots and lots of enemies in a short period of time also increases your combo meter. When your meter reaches 10 you get to drop a bomb that kills enemies in the surrounding area. You can also slow down time for a brief period if this get a bit too crazy. You add all of this together and you get a fun fast shooter .

+ The game has plenty of interesting modes to keep you engaged. Each mode is vastly different from the last and offers plenty of different ways to play the game. 

+Great music

+ This game is the definition of pick up and play if you are looking to kill some time. Lots of replayability

The Bad:

- Some achievements are very hard to get 

- Can be frustrating at times

Conclusion

Considering I got this game for one dollar, it probably is one of the better purchases I've made. If you love the genre then this is a fantastic game to add to your library. If your just a casual fan like myself then you will also find it enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090304979', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1671276817}

author: {'steamid': '76561198116199103', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1546666552}
review: DEMOをやってみて面白そうだと思って購入したが、DEMOが一番いいところだけでゴミゲーでした。曲もDEMOのが一番いい曲で後の曲は数曲しかなくてゴミ曲ばかり、ステージ構成も変わり映えなし、ゲームモードが8種類ぐらいありますがどれも取ってつけたかのような適当モード。買わないほうがいいけど、お金持ちならリスト増やすコレクションにおすすめ。非常に肯定的という評価も信じられなくなった貴重な一作。

author: {'steamid': '76561198067490289', 'num_games_owned': 9232, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1423755404}
review:
このゲームは見た目でも分かるようにGeometry Warsの類似作品となっており、とてもシンプルで硬派な全方位STGです。

[良い点]
● 映像のエフェクトやHUDの透明度などが自由にカスタマイズ可能となっており、各個人の環境や好みに合わせてプレイすることが出来る。
● 包囲攻撃がある場合はアラームが事前に鳴る。敵の出現位置は適切なので理不尽さを感じさせないように配慮されている。
● BGMも良く出来ている。
● ゲームモードは7種類あり、どれもが個性的で楽しめる。
● 数年前にリリースされたゲームだが、最近でもゲームモードの追加などが行われており好感が持てる。

[気になった点]
● 自機がボール形状のためか、移動には若干慣性が働く仕様となっている。
● 武器のパワーアップはなく、オプション設定でバレットとレーザーのどちらかを選択出来るが、レーザーはかなり使いにくいためスコアが伸びにくい。

大漁に湧いた敵を誘爆で一掃する瞬間がとても気持ち良いゲーム。
ハイスコアを狙うには必然的に接近戦やスローモーション、ボムを駆使する積極的なプレイが必要となり腕が試される。
セールで$1になったりするし、STGファンならプレイする価値は十分にある。8/10点

author: {'steamid': '76561197987482041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1414502200}

review: I feel this game is perfect for Pick-up-and-plays before work or as a reward for studying in the Crunch Time mode but is also an enjoyable progression curve for durational play. The soundtrack is active and the gameplay sucks you in. I love playing this game once a day so far!

author: {'steamid': '76561198027086818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1478041106}
review:
A hectic and vibrant twin-stick arena-based shooter that delivers. 

The Good:
- Includes several different unique game modes, which each provide their own challenges, and each are even entertaining in their own right.
- The graphics are lively and vibrant, and add to the feeling of the overwhelming odds stacked against you.
- The bomb mechanic is excellent.  I get chills thinking about times I cleared the arena with 3 consecutive bombs strikes just as i was getting overrun.
- Has a good variety of distinguishable enemies, and the slowly-growing "virus" is a wonderful touch that allows you to turn an encroaching foe into an arena-clearing weapon.
- I think the music is good. Honestly I can't remember it.
- The game has the derisive sense of humor of an older brother.
- It's made by a studio called Squid in a Box, which might be the best studio name ever.
- The game menus are succinct, fast, and well-designed.

The Bad:
- With everything going on around you and the colorful graphical effects it's easy to lose track of what's going on. 
- The leaderboards seem hacked.  Everyone in the top 10 or whatever has the exact same astronomical score.
- Some people might be turned off by the pace of this game. 

Overall I recommend this game, especially if you like fast-paced arcade-style shooters where you die a lot but occasionally have those epic runs you want to tell you friends about.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997020330', 'num_games_owned': 3753, 'num_reviews': 166, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1565885510}
review: Катись, стреляй, выживай! Красивая аркада без очевидного сюжета, в которой, в любом из режимов игры вам, в виде шарика придется катиться, отбиваться от разноцветных частиц, некоторые агрессивно несутся на ваш шарик, некоторые просто попадаются под горячую руку. Есть режим выживания, режим ограниченного времени, режим в котором следует находиться только на ограниченном пространстве, режим, напоминающий минирование и взрыв бомбы. Вобщем игра хорошая, считаю что держался достаточно долго в каждом режиме, но увидев рекорды друга упал в депрессию и закрыл игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043428371', 'num_games_owned': 282, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 976, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1549163719}
review:
This is the kind of game that when you lose you say "Ok, I'm gonna play just one more..." and then you wake up 3 days later totally wasted with you controller crashed against the wall and all you can see is colorful dots flying around your vision. Seriously, this game is a challenge that makes you keep trying to best yourself even though you know that, by the end, the game always wins.

It's fun, it's cheap, it has a high replayability factor and don't let me get started with the sarcastic jokes all around the game!

author: {'steamid': '76561197969730757', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1412545026}
review:
If you like twin-stick shooters (keyboard+mouse is actually more fun) and/or score attack, this is a definite recommendation.
I like neither. ... I likeD neither. Then I got Waves. ^^

Upsides:
- Launches quickly without forcing you to sit through endless logos. (Two skippables, and if you rename the video files, you get undelayed launch.)
- Many different game modes that all utilize, hone and broaden the basic skillset of the player.
- Good music.
- Some peculiar, moderate humor that is almost like a sports coach at times.
- Plenty of achievement goals.

Generally very motivating. Many details I cannot put into words. The whole package just is a lot of fun.
And, hell, it has a demo! You can check for yourself! Yay!

Downsides:
- You can't choose which music plays.
- Maybe some minor obstacles when using a game controller for menu navigation.
- Leaderboard display tediously slow.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048965861', 'num_games_owned': 358, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1526983994}
review:
The ball who shoots other balls
This has to be one of the best game you can play when you got nothing to do.
This is not really a game that i would sit and play for hours more like minutes every now and then

Standard Rules: If any of the balls touches you, you die so that's why you have lasers to shoot them before they touch you because they charge you like bulls.

The map or whatever is circular and the balls spawns randomly and you can ofcourse you move around to dodge and shoot.

There are high scores in the game that you always try to beat
It's really fun and there's many different game modes but one thing for sure, the action never ends!
It's everything to survival and different challenges and the soundtracks are awesome!
It even got one of those sweet GLaDOS voices! Like cmon buy it already!

This game is really worth the money, I would buy it again.

rating 7.5/10 - ☠ Pirate ☠

author: {'steamid': '76561198013026902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1652231629}
review: "Connection lost!" has become one of my least favorite phrases!  Great game though...tons of different play modes.  Easy to learn, hard to master.  Challenging and addicting, for me anyway.  Enjoy!

author: {'steamid': '76561198063392860', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1139, 'last_played': 1532811087}
review: Waves has a surprising number of different gaming modes.  Only after playing it for a few days, I have my favorites and find the entire game quite addicting.  The more I play, the better I get and the more I want to play.  I have a controller and find the controls very smooth.  The in game tools at your disposal are limited (Slow-Mo and bomb), but are very useful and affective.  Both have saved my life numerous times.  As you level up, you have a chance to get a score multiplier.  I really hate when it disappears before I can grab it, but it does add some difficulty to the game.  I purchased this game when it was on sale, but it's definately worth the full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029352134', 'num_games_owned': 599, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1477224263}
review:
How-To-Play Section alone makes this game worth it.

This game is hard as hell and also addicting, But there are only few soundtrack in the game and I personally think its fcking suck! Theres a music that is too loud and theres some that is almost non existant (humming ambience). Playing third party music in the background is highly recommended.

8/10 Great time killer, When theres nothing better to do. I'm occupied most of the time so I dont get to play it alot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049074503', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1704577498}
review:
Sencillo y entretenido, deudor del Geometry Wars (las similitudes son evidentes), algo más 'descafeinado', y con un único escenario que en algunos momentos se queda pequeño, pero que funciona perfectamente para todos los modos que el juego ofrece (Prueba de tiempo, supervivencia, retos, bomba, etc).

La banda sonora es correcta, disfrutable y que acompaña bastante bien durante las partidas (en otros juegos del mismo estilo llega a ser muy pesada la música), y el aspecto gráfico igual, las explosiones y brillos de los enemigos al destruirlos no estorban ni complican la visión del resto del escenario (en juegos como Beat Hazard no consigues ver nada y eso dificulta la jugabilidad y el disfrute).

En resumen, un juego correcto dentro de este estilo, quizás no tan destacable como otros más populares, pero entretenido para pasar un rato y desconectar, que merece la pena de oferta para los amantes de este estilo de juegos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055557163', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1476616216}

author: {'steamid': '76561198003534522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 407, 'last_played': 1598539423}
review: Waves это отличный представитель своего жанра, в нём есть всё, что должно быть: приятная музыка, драйв, наличие разных режимов, соревновательный элемент. Картинка приятная, оптимизация тоже. Никаких минусов, кроме довольно небольшого набора треков, мной обнаружено не было. Каждый раз обещаешь себе, что вот это ну самый последний и запускаешь еще добрую сотню раз. Отличный таймкиллер, что радует глаз и ухо.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967779846', 'num_games_owned': 1256, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1450850145}
